text: Outstanding meat  I ve been there twice  and I ordered the small flank steak plate both times  I wish I could say I m going to branch out in the future  but it s so flavorful that I can t make that promise  The small portion is definitely enough for dinner if you have a moderate appetite  To round out the meal  order an appetizer  I ve had the jamon plate with goat cheese  delicious   the roasted corn  delicious   and the fungos  The mushroom portion was a bit scant for     but they tasted great in combination with the meat   I definitely recommend stocking up on sauces while you wait for your food   the ajo is my favorite  Beware that there is essentially no very little seating at the restaurant  If you can snag a table outside that s great  otherwise there is just a little counter space inside   My one complaint is that there were a ton of flies on the patio area the first evening I was there  They were gross and distracted from the experience   but the food was good enough that I went back a second time within two weeks  BYOB
The food here is delicious and fairly priced  You can also have a sit down meal in less than an hour which is rare  Get the rosemary braised beef sandwich and load up on the sauces

It is hard for me to write this because I really wanted to enjoy this place  We ordered the ribeye  mixed veggies  the mixed plate of meat  and brussels sprouts  It cost about      The food came promptly and we dug in  only to find all of the meat cold  Not warm  cold as if it had been laying around for an hour  We were starving after having driven   hours from Allentown  so we just ate it anyway  It did taste pretty good  We told the busboy about the coldness when he asked  and he offered a free dessert  but as I am diabetic  I said no  So  I would have given this place maybe   or   stars  but then I got sick  Not food poisoning level sick  but bloated  gassy  and indigestion all day  A bit nauseous as well  I have a stomach of steel  too  I almost never get sick from food   Just know that this place isn t all that it is cracked up to be  even the cuts of strip steak had tons of fat and the veggies were unevenly cooked  And  if your food is cold  get your money back and run  We probably just had a fluke of a meal but still

My new fav restaurant  Not for everyone  though   The only seating is a ledge around the outside of the small room   There are a few stools    The food is incredible   Rosemary beef sandwich    Yum    Chorizo    Tasty    Greens  very good   I really did start to crave more the next day     I only regret I didn t bring any beer for the staff
Be prepared for a little tiny space  The staff is vey friendly and helpful  The food is very good  We brought our own bottle of wine and they supplied some wine glasses  A lot of fun

Several friends recommended Gaucho so i decided to check things out for my self    The first thing that caught my attention was the wood smoke aroma     theres some seating along the walls   With Additional seating outside   So I ordered a steak carna sandwich  and it was frigging amazing    The bread had the perfect texture  Not too heavy  kinda springy     The steak had been perfectly cooked  and had great smoked flavor  That wasn t overpowering   Overall great balance of smokey and spicy   If you plan to come around noon during the week   be prepared to wait as the line might be out the door   Yes   the wait is a slight inconvenience    But well worth the wait     if ya want to avoid the lunch rush I suggest   comming  around       or closer to

Yes  Finally  I got to take someone here  I do not know why but whenever anyone visits this is my go to suggestion AND yet people sometimes say no because of the wait  Let me tell you each and every minute I wait is worth it  My aunt and uncle were in town for the baseball game  btw we won  and I suggested we go here  We were already in the Strip District so they said ok  We walked in and they were just wide eyed gaping at the menu not knowing what to try or where to even start  They kept on saying  wow it smell good  There was no wait  miracle   and we got a table right in front  I got us each of the dips and sat waiting for our food to come and them to be amazed    Accompa amientos  Maiz  Grilled Corn on the Cob  It was amazing as usual  I talked my aunt into getting one with me  She bit into it just saying  wow   that is good  It was sweet and grilled to perfection  Each time I get this corn there is nothing that I would add to it at all  My aunt added one of the sauces  or maybe a bit of all the sauces  to hers and really seemed to enjoy that mixture    Peque os  Provoletta  Sharp provolone grilled with arugula  lemon  and olives on toast   I did not order this my aunt did for her main course  She said that it was almost too much cheese  if that is even a real complaint  but it was grilled to perfection  She also realized after this dish that she like arugula  It looked good  It was a nice thick slab of cheese on their toasted bread  i loved the look of it and would love to try it on another visit    Con pan  Pescado Fish of the day w  lettuces  lemon  and caramelized onion   This is my jam  I get this all the time even though I always want to try new things  It is just so good  The onions are just perfection  Smokey and soft with the hint of the grill in them  The tilapia just grilled so that it flakes off in your mouth but stays together in the sandwich  The lettuce is abundant and so when things fall off the sandwich you also have a little side salad to go with it  The bread is just the best  Light and crusty    yummmmm  I would eat this everyday    Exclusivos  Cerdo  Pork tenderloin  caramelized onion  and spicy mustard  Served with a small casa salad and tostado  At the last minute after much back and forth my uncle decided on the LARGE plate of the cerdo  It was a mountain of pork  He got it and when he looked at the plate just goes  maybe I should have gone with the small  He said the meat was great and the side of spicy mustard was just the right kick to make the plate amazing  He really loved it    I always enjoy showing and bringing people to some of my favorite places around the  burg  I love it even more when the people love the places we get to try  I am so happy they had a great time and can not wait to go back
BYOB  No cork charge  Definitely a bonus  food is very delicious and staff is very friendly and fun

I m pretty much just piling on at this point  but everything you read about this place is true  It s ridiculously good  The filet was the most tender steak I ever had  My wife and I split everything  we also got a flank steak sandwich which was very good  and some empanadas which were also tasty  The sauces are king here  my favorite was the Ajo  garlic  but they are all good  Be prepared to wait  but it s BYOB so just drink outside while you wait

My boyfriend and I were walking past and couldn t ignore the delicious smell coming from the open front door  Everything was delicious and the folks here are  friendly   If you don t know what to get they re happy to recommend something  You could tell they all share a real sense of pride in the place and why not  The restaurant looks great and the sandwiches are killer
Delicious steak and chicken dishes  I don t recall what we order but they were both really good  Chill atmosphere  Good for a hangout and a nice easy date
Really good steak try the steak burger    Sauces are incredible and the price is good

I m impressed with the smoked wood aroma that ultimately made us turn back in our tracks to go see what this place had to offer   You step in and immediately you re in clear view of the grill with the wonderful   tasty creations going on right before your eyes   Staff is knowledgeable and explained the menu quite well as this was our first time here    Our order was taken promptly and we headed out to the quaint patio to choose our table as the place was quickly getting busy  They offer a delectable choice of sauces to complement the main entr e  The garlic was by far my favorite  Although  each sauce added a certain flair to every bite of steak  We ordered a regular size order of the skirt steak  the portions were more than plenty  A side of rice   and a roasted corn completed our meal  Presentation was great  They used wooden oblong plates that added a certain element to the dish   Our order was brought out to our table surprisingly fast   The skirt steak was tender  juicy and seasoned just right and served with a fresh baby greens salad and a slice of buttery toast  The roasted corn was tasty  The yellow saffron rice was good  The empanadas were okay  Overall   the food was delectable and I will be back to try the rest of the menu offerings   I m giving it four stars due to the fact that they didn t have a bathroom for patrons

Great place for any time of day  We got the meat sampler and were not disappointed  The only thing that wasn t that great was the empanada  kind of lacked flavor  If not for that would of gotten    Also it s a BRB

Was very good  but not excellent  The price for my NY Strip was great and the portion was okay  but the cut was very chewy and a bit tough  especially for medium rare  Their in house sauces were excellent and the service was very nice  Will be back to try some other items  Oh try the side of mushrooms  delish

Wow  I love Gaucho  I ve only been here twice but I crave it constantly  My coworkers and I have ordered from here and it s ridiculous because it s so much food during the middle of the day  But we can t help ourselves    We ve all only have gotten sandwiches and salads  The bread is out of this world  Tasty  soft and crunchy at the same time  How is that possible   and the meat is literally cooked perfectly  It tastes so good  as well  It tastes exactly like it should    This is a hard review for me to write because it s hard to explain how great the food here tastes  It s just really high quality and no BS  Definitely will be coming here as much as I can  Please do yourself a favor and visit when you can

Best place in pittsburgh   Tons of variety  Went here when it first opened and didn t have the expansion it has now  With the extra room this place will be an extremely popular place to get food  The steak  chorizo  lamb are all outstanding  Sandwiches are equally as amazing and make a great lunch option  If one can eat here  it is optimal  but I have taken out from here quite a bit and the quality is still excellent  Hours are limited during weekdays to   pm so get there early

Gaucho is Pittsburgh s best restaurant  The sandwiches are incredible and reasonably priced  They have incredibly fresh ingredients and I have honestly never had a bad experience  The paella is delicious  even having had it homemade before from a true paella master from Spain  The steak platter  asado platter  is also incredible and is   different cuts of meat  The sides such as potatoes  rice  etc  are all also delicious pairings with the larger dishes    My only negative experience at Gaucho came from the waiting process  The restaurant is extremely successful and after their expansion only became more popular  So popular  that most nights the line extends out the door onto the sidewalk outside  This wouldn t be a problem  except that it s poorly executed and often ends in frustration for several people standing in line  On top of that  what appeared to be an owner of manager addressed the crowd of willing  paying customers in a somewhat aggravated manner  It s obviously busy and people are confused  The last thing we want is to be yelled at by the staff before we have even ordered    Other than the poorly executed waiting process  and slight confusion between employees and customers  Gaucho is a special place  It has surpassed my other favorite restaurants as of late
I have a new favorite place to eat   Order the Rosemary Braised Beef  You won t be disappointed
The steak plate is always my favorite      And I can t remember which dessert I had but it was absolutely astounding
I love Gaucho   I go whenever I want something special  The wait in line is worth it

I finally had an opportunity to visit Gaucho  during one of my frequent work trips to Pittsburgh and I m happy that I did     OMG   The wait was long on a Wednesday night  so I can just imagine the weekend   I waited for at least    minutes  starting at approx        When I finally reached the front of the line  I had changed my mind about what I was going to order at least    times    lol   I decided on the ribeye plate w      order of shrimp and grilled mushrooms   I was then escorted to my table by one of the porters  and the second wait began  at least       minutes  but the food was absolutely worth the wait   The steak was accompanied by the mixed gaucho salad which included caramelized onions and strips of carrots  in a house dressing  delicious   There was also a slice of grilled ciabatta bread for dipping in those beautiful  housemade sauces   I thought that my favorite would be the chimichurri  which I enjoyed  but my favorite was the garlic  also tried the onion and red pepper sauces   The sauces were the perfect compliment to the entire meal   The ribeye was cooked perfectly  between medium and medium well  just the right amount of fat  which I usually don t like  but in this instance  kept the meat  moist and juicy   The shrimp were perfect as well   Shout out to the cashier  who helped me in choosing the desired  doneness  for both   The entire staff was a bit laid back  in a good way  super nice and very helpful    On the way out  I ordered the apple pecan bread pudding  which required  another  wait  approx    minutes  but it s baked to order  so I won t complain  and after tasting  I absolutely had no complaints      I will ABSOLUTELY return

What a wonderful and delicious evening   The entire event  designed especially for Valentine in the Bodega  downstairs dining room   was well planned  executed  and a total success   Each dish of the four course meal was perfectly prepared and served   Despite the  family style dining among    strangers  the experience was enriching   We all left with new friends   We enjoyed meeting our dining partners and felt warmly welcomed by our lovely hostesses   Thank you for a wonderful evening    know tomorrow night s edition will go just as well

This is still one of my absolute favorite Pittsburgh restaurants  even after my going fully vegetarian a few years back   Given that     of the menu is steak related  I think that s a testament to the quality of all the food   They have a wood fired veggie sandwich that still makes me weep happy tears  and they have an always tasty veggie empanada of the day  as well as a daily meat focused one    In addition  there are several side dishes that are vegetarian and excellent  including scrumptious salads  potatoes  and veggies     I m sure other reviews have mentioned how crowded it is  because the word is out about the ridiculous deliciousness of Gaucho  Most of the time you will be waiting in a long line spiraling outside the door   I ts still worth it   They seem to move people inside and seat people at a good pace   I tend to go right when they open for lunch when the line isn t too bad  and plan to heed the advice of others and call in a take out order to avoid the wait   Heavenly food

Came here with a group of    and had a great experience  They were able to seat us immediately after we ordered even though we had a huge party on a Friday at   pm  I got the sirloin steak cooked at medium rare and we got the paella to share  Everything was absolutely delicious  Love the sauces   especially the ajo  Definitely will be coming back here
I still love this place  They moved to a bigger spot with more room and more seating but the food still tastes amazing
Do yourself a favor and get down to Gaucho   Everything on the menu is amazing  I highly recommend the wings they are phenomenal

So this was my first time here   it was a little different   when you first walk in there s a huge chalkboard with the entire menu of what they have to offer  Once you make your choice you can go to the cashier and place your order and they ll give you your drinks  You then proceed to another line  with drinks in hand  where you wait to be seated  When your food is ready they ll deliver it to your table and at that point you re on your own  If you want to order anything additional you have to go through the whole process all over again  For example  we thought about getting a dessert and were deterred because we didn t have the time  Outside of that the food was excellent  Everything was fresh and cooked well

I am a little confused as to why there are so many over the top excellent reviews for this restaurant   This was my first visit today and I absolutely had to try it when so many people gave it a five star review   It definitely is a hip  cool restaurant for the Pittsburgh scene and maybe that is what is clouding people s judgment   The sandwiches were good but definitely not spectacular   I has the pulled chicken which was more like pieces of chicken breast meat  definitely not pulled  which was a disappointment   The Provoletta appetizer was o k  but basically just melted cheese on top of toast  really nothing overly special   The sauces that are provided for free were good but  again  nothing outstanding     It was very pricey with a lunch for two costing       Also  we grabbed the only two remaining seats in the place which were bar stools crammed in the hallway between the kitchen area and upstairs dining area   Underneath the stools is stacked wood which makes this seating area awkward   There is no place to stick your legs while eating so sitting sideways is somewhat mandatory   Plus  my husband bummed his knees a couple of times off of the wood   I m not sure who s idea this was but they maybe should have rethought it     I am glad that I went for the experience but won t be back

Amazing  There is really nothing I can say about this place that hasn t already been said  All I can do is agree with every single wonderful life changing sentiment  It s really that good  It must be owned by magical unicorns

Incredible Flavor  Girlfriend and I had to stop in after seeing all the great reviews and it s all so true  The steak is extremely flavorful and tender  skirt steak sandwich   The best steak sandwich I can ever remember having  Great chimichurri sauce to  Girlfriend had the shrimp which was very fresh and you could taste the grilling which I find really nice  We also tried for apps the grilled vegetables and chorizo sausage  Everything was excellent  We will be back very very soon
Love this place every time  Casual dining  Great  friendly service  All the food is delicious  Amazing lamb and fish  Always get dessert no matter how full you are  Try all the sauces on everything

Yesterday a friend texted   Want to try Gaucho s   I ll go anywhere and my hubs said people have been talkin  about this place so unbeknownst to what I was getting myself into  I agreed   This place does not take any reservations  For that fact alone  I wanted to go at  pm  Especially because it was Saturday  I said to my friend   Only crazy people go to a good place during dinner time on a Saturday   Well   we turned into those crazy people  Not necessarily on purpose  but as the events of the evening unfolded  our party of   became THOSE PEOPLE who went to Gaucho s on a Saturday night  At  pm ish  And we wind up arriving to find a massive line around the block   I have not stood in any line like this EVER in Pittsburgh  Correction   I have   just once   for preschool sign up   but even still I was done with that in    minutes  This line  We waited in it for   hour and    minutes  just to order   In the rain  I mean we arrived  I saw this line  and I said to my friends   What the hell have you gotten me into   I had not researched this place  I did not see it s insanely long list of positive Yelp reviews  I felt like I was back in high school waiting for concert tickets  Fortunately  I wasn t yet hungry so I didn t care   With all those details  long line  long wait  rain  etc    I feel strongly there is no one other than me that had the highest of expectations for this meal  Did it deliver  Absolutely  And in exciting news  even though the wait was painful   the food was delivered fast after we were seated  For the delicious food  I would give this location   stars  If there s no wait   read this review as   stars and then go  But for the insanely painful wait and the wish that they could figure out some better solution so no one has to wait   hours  That s why I subtracted a star  I mean  the way this location is set up  if you re waiting  you can see the people inside eating  And you re like   feet away from them  While we were in this   hour line  I saw a man inside take   minutes to eat his last bite of salad  Everyone else in this party of   was done eating and this one person WOULD NOT STOP TALKING and just HAD to finish the last bite of salad on his plate  Fine  But you know what  When people are standing outside in the rain  waiting to eat  we re giving you death stares from the window thinking   STOP TALKING  TAKE YOUR DAMN BITE  and be on your way     The fact that any restaurant could entice this kind of emotion or thought process is why I subtracted a star  I mean   our party of   had a fun experience but sometimes you don t want an  experience    sometimes you just want to eat a delicious meal    So here s the summary    star food   star employees No reservations   so plan your time and hunger accordingly BYOB   don t forget a bottle opener FYI on those nights when the wait is insane  most people start drinking in the line     one poor party of   ahead of us DROPPED THEIR BOTTLE OF WINE   it was terribly sad  Don t leave the butterfingers in your group in charge of the only thing that will keep you sane while you subject yourself to the weather and hunger games  And if you so decide to be those crazy people who go on a Saturday night like us at dinner time  bring LOTS of BYOB but do yourself a favor  don t forget some plastic cups and or class it up by have your pregame prepared with SOMETHING in a travel coffee mug  I can t even remotely condone public drinking   I would actually be scared to open beer or wine while in line  we waited until we were inside  but I regretted not having something in hand for   hours   Oh yeah   and that peanut butter bread pudding dessert  JUST SAY YES

It s awesome   Great service  great taste  great smell  and great atmosphere   You must try   The indoor space is limited  and the restaurant is very popular  so try to arrive there      am if you want to have lunch there on weekend   I love the shrimps and salmon  today s fish   Sandwich and salad are also good  There are a lot I want to try  so I will go there again definitely  Do not forget to get some sauce on the table  It fit all meat

Really loved Gaucho  Came with friends on a sunny day  The wait was about an hour  which is usual for this place   so make sure you don t come starving  I got the flank steak plate which is served with salad  a slice of toast and sauce  The steak was cooked perfectly and was super flavorful  All four sauces are really good and complimented the steak  Also got a side of roasted cauliflower that was delicious and seasoned to perfection  I definitely recommend  Gaucho and cannot wait to go back and try more

I will preface this review by saying that I am an Ohio girl giving something in the Burgh   stars  On that fact alone  everyone should go   it is that good  And i you come here  you too will realize that there is no other rating you can give Gaucho s  From the smell alone when you walk in the door  you know you are about to have a good time    Upon entering in from the rain  we were greeted very warmly by almost everyone that worked there  As we were deciding what to order  they happily walked us through everything on the menu to help us make good selections since unfortunately  you can t actually eat everything on the menu    but you will want to   We got the skirt  the rib eye  the shrimp  mixed veggies  and corn   and every single thing was OUTSTANDING  I didn t realize that I hadn t taken the obligatory  food photo  until the plates were already empty  oops  sorry yelpers     Pro tip  you might be tempted to overlook it  but make sure to get an ear of corn  I know it sounds simple  but it is amazing   and you too will not believe you when they tell you there is no butter on it  It s also BYOB  but make sure you bring some to share

Went for a Sat  family lunch  and Gaucho surpassed our high expectations  based on all the glowing reviews here  The  small  steak plates    with salad   grilled bread    are a great value  and our   y o  devoured hers like a tiger  Mom loved her ribeye  and my hanger steak sandwich with roasted red peppers was perfect   We split sides of patatas bravas   yellow rice  ideal for mopping up the juices   Don t miss the salsas    ajo and chimichurri were our favorites  but the pepper and the onion were both tasty   distinctive  too   The staff were terrific  helpful with a dash of humor   and the snug indoor eating space  a handful of stools and some standing room  is fun if you re willing to be flexible   friendly   We ll bring a bottle of tinto to take advantage of the BYOB policy next time

Gaucho doesn t look like much when you walk by  but dont be fooled   This place is all about its wood fired grill and the aroma of burnt wood and food fills the air around the   th Street Bridge  Currently  they are a small place that does better for take out  They do vegan  vegetarian  gluten free and tons of meat selection for we carnivores  Put this place on you list to check out but dont expect to have a seat  Very limited seating     high tops chairs  They bought the neighboring building and will have much more seating by the end of the summer though  Definitely looking forward to seeing what Gaucho has to offer in the future   obsessed already with their wood fired cuisine

While this is not a formal dining experience it is a good one   Location very cool and food is very good    The Argentine flavors are excellent   Try the trio of sauces  If you are looking for something different give this place a try  Employees are extremely friendly
Amazing food  nice atmosphere  The line is long so be prepared to wait for an hour or so before ordering

Fantastic   The steak burger is one of the best sandwiches I ve ever eaten in my life   Perfectly cooked and perfectly seasoned   The pork shoulder sandwich could use a bit more sauce on it  but luckily  they provide you with four delicious sauces to add   This is hands down the best restaurant I ve eaten at in the city so far    years
The food is wonderful  A nice addition to the strip

I was in Pittsburgh for business and visited Gaucho twice for dinner  despite the       minute wait to get it  The flavor here is incredible  If you have a problem with waiting in line  or you re that person that will endure but complain about the line to everyone waiting   don t kill the vibe and head down to McDonald s    You can see it from the line   Also  it s BYOB  So grab a bottle of wine on your way  Or two  one for dinner  one for the line

I was visiting Pittsburg for work and stumbled on this place  The line was outside the door but only took    minute to get to our table  I ordered a steak medium rare and it taste very good and was cooked to perfection  The service was friendly and prompt  I was with   others who were from California too and we all enjoyed our dishes   When in Pittsburg I will be visiting this place again

worth the wait  and even better if you re smart and order ahead or come on off hours  It s so good  our downtown office orders ahead and  sends team members on the bus to go pick it up  My favorites are the chorizo sandwich and the provoletta  but all of their sandwiches are outstanding and a fantastic deal  Their sauce options enhance the whole experience and set this place head and shoulders above the rest
BYOB but not cash only  Amazing food  Known for the meats but don t skimp on the sides  either

Damn this place is so good   But those lines man  those lines   The meats  the flavors  the everything make it worth it   If you drive by and don t see the line out the door  then get out of your car and go inside

Absolutely love the food at Gaucho  everything was excellent  The decor and food is very nostalgic of Argentina  However  to keep in line with the Latin way of dining and improve the overall experience  redesign is needed  Gaucho  in an attempt to reduce costs  with limited space and staffing requires customers wait in line to order food  including dessert  then be seated  The wait is often very long  making it not ideal for the elderly or disabled or those of us that want to sit down with a glass of wine and enjoy a scrumptious meal without standing in line

This was our second time being there and we wanted to get deeper into the menu and give it one more chance so we ordered steak  chicken  sausage  salads  fried cheese etc    to be honest I should have just went to wholeys and bought food to  cook at home  The food at Gaucho  especially for the price was lack luster  the meat came out semi warm with nothing but burnt cold sour dough bread slices as a topper  Let me just state that I have been to Argentina a few times and the food there makes gaucho look like a McDonald s  anyways the meats did not have any distinct flavors that would separate then from any other   star restaurant but the spicey chorizo sausage was the only good item we had  The portion size is almost about right  the presentation is acceptable which can sometimes make up for the lack of cooking skills the chiefs have  Everyone that works there is a brain washed hipster with dreads or long slick backed hair  no one in the kitchen is from Argentina  You of course can go there are try it for yourself but I wouldn t recommend it  Nothing is special about the place  Some people think it s the greatest place on earth and that s because they most likely never been anywhere else
Again  FIVE STARS    Incredible filet  chimichurri sauce  red roasted potatoes  salad  grilled olive oil bread  all delicious and satisfying   Can t wait to come back again

Excellent flavors  and nice staff  I had the small New York steak  Bife de chorizo  and a couple of empanadas  The grilled meats are cooked to your taste  Make sure you get each of the four sauces and try them with your food  The place is Zagat rated  I found the prices very reasonable for quality food

This place was incredible    Definitely get the rosemary braised beef  especially if you like horseradish  and the surf and turf was great    The shrimp was cooked perfectly and flank steak was excellent  All four of their sauces went great with the meat and shrimp  I especially liked the chimichurri sauce  Really friendly staff and it s BYOB    Bring some extra beer  or whiskey  for the staff there and they will treat you right    Overall  great experience and I will definitely coming back

I don t know anyone who has been to Gaucho and not loved it   I m a vegetarian and big fan of cheese so I always go for their provolone sandwich   My boyfriend loves meat and he is crazy about their steak sandwiches   The only problem is that there are only a few tables inside to eat at   Best to go on a weeknight or get it to go   So worth it though

Really great restaurant     Unusual set up   you wait in line to view the menu  order your drinks at one counter  then order your food at another counter  then they seat you  and they call your name when your food is ready but deliver it to your table   Steaks were melt in your mouth good   Highly recommend the Garlic   Rosemary Shrimp too   Atmosphere was kind of hipster    way too clean to be considered a dive   Really good dinner choice for my husband  our     year old daughter  and myself during a short visit to Pittsburgh
Best new place in Pgh   The aroma of the wood fired grill will lead you down the strip and into this friendly place   The food is simply amazing

I ve heard so much hype about this place that I was half expecting it to fall short of my expectations but it blew me away   I got the steak burger with a side of veggies    Great combo because you can add whatever veggies you like to the burger   Both were out of this world on their own though   The burger is also quite a meal so be prepared for a lot of food

Let me stress how tasty the braised beef is  I have yet to stop at the venue but I have had the finished product from here  AND LET ME TELL YOU     THESE GUYS KNOW THEIR TASTE BUDS  Not to mention they seem like they LOOOVE what they do too   Beef they cooked was tender and mixed with potatoes  horse radish and another key ingredient that I do not know  Any way the mix of sweet and spicy in a dish is something I had yet to experience to this extent    Also had shrimp with asparagus and rice which tasted very good  but did not measure up to colorful taste of the braised beef    Food seemed well put together and healthy    Cannot wait to visit their venue and indulge in all the colorful flavors they have

Service  everyone is nice and friendly  Awesome overall  Employees wear regular everyday clothes so a lot of times  I actually mistook an employee for a patron  Ha  Service is also fast and we didn t wait long to receive our food    Price  pretty expensive    Food  so good  Sauce is delicious and I love that it is self serve  I can grab as much as I need  Steak is a must    How to order  check out the menu while you re waiting in line and walk up to the counter to order  Go sit down  servers will bring you plates and utensils  Wait to hear your name be called and the server will bring your food to your table    Kids  I had my   year old daughter with me and immediately after sitting  an employee approached us with a book and a toy to keep my daughter entertained  Awesome    Will definitely be back

I had tried to go to Gaucho once before  but since the lines tend to be long I never made it to the door  Yesterday we had the chance to get there for an early dinner    and I must say  it was worth the wait  We ordered five different items to share and I don t know which was the best  The chicken Empanadas    for     were a nice start   we paired them with the dipping sauces available for a little extra flavor   The Provoletta was amazing  Perfectly cooked and was nice to share with this amount but isn t too heavy to have all to yourself  The corn mash  I forget the actual name  was possibly my favorite item   served warm  it was absolutely delicious  Then we shared a sliced beef plate that had good flavor and a nice medley of veggies   caramelized onions with it    Top that all off with the pineapple bread pudding and a nice bottle of red  BYOB  but NO CORKING FEE   while sitting outside was a perfect Tuesday   Everyone was friendly and helpful when we couldn t decide all the dishes we wanted   and the wait staff was fantastic  I ll definitely be back

Overpriced and overhyped  The ordering process is terrible  Stand in line for an hour to order then hope there s a table ready between then and when your food comes out  Steak sandwich was good  Shrimp were overlooked and overpriced      for     they should be large and delicious  they weren t  Salads had around   pieces of lettuce with    cent sides  Spent     for dinner for two with no sides or drinks and had to go to primantis after to fill up  If you must go because you ve heard so much hype like ourselves  stick to the sammiches
The steak burger was one of these meals i have ever had    BYOB and get ready to eat good  Great service too

Gaucho s new and expanded space is awesome   It s really great to be able to enjoy this incredible food without feeling super cramped  Plus  the BYOB aspect is much more appealing now that they are open for dinners and you can really settle into your own table   All of their food is absolutely fantastic   After coming back from a backpacking trip to South America  I still thought Gaucho s food was amazing   My favorite item to get for the value is their Steakburger  which is really just a giant smoked burger with two of your choices of fixins  cheese is a little extra  I think   It s a big burger and will satisfy even the hungriest of us eaters  If you re looking to splurge and love steak  you cannot go wrong with one of their platters   I want to mention two more highlights of Gaucho  They recently added wings to the appetizer section  and DAMN are they good   They are cooked on a wood fired grill like much of the rest of the menu  then tossed in some kind of magically delicious hot pepper oil and scallion sauce  with grilled lemons on the side   If you haven t tried them yet  go and get some   Finally    their sauces  Oh my gosh their sauces are DELICIOUS  And they are self serve  so try them all and then load up on your favorite one

Hands down  best sandwich I have ever had   Carne Sandwich with Skirt Steak is my go to   Perfectly cooked steak on fluffy ciabatta that soaks up all of the goodness   Topped with caramelized onions and roasted red peppers   The staff is always friendly  no matter how busy it is    and man can it be busy on the weekends   Call ahead to order and you dont have to wait in the long line   The owner is very cool  gave me a beer once  its BYOB but he had a growler of some East End Big Hop   which was awesome     Plus  they have dog bones for a buck that my dog goes absolutely crazy for    sorta like I do for the sammie   Get there    it is worth it

My friend Rachel C brought me to Gaucho on my recent Pittsburgh trip and it was a total riot  The guys who work there are hilarious and super flirty   hanging out while we waited for our food was so much fun   We both opted for steak sandwiches with chimichurri and caramelized onions  The sandwich was delicious and very filling  We also ordered sides of the roasted potatoes and vegetables  which were great    We managed to hit Gaucho on the final day before they closed for renovations  Wishing them the best and looking forward to checking out the updates next time I m in Pittsburgh

Gaucho Parrilla has become one of my favorites in Pittsburgh  It s  th in the nation on Yelp s list for best restaurants in the US and definitely deserves its place there    I went with a friend and even though the bus dropped us across the bridge  the stop is right BEFORE the bridge  but he just kept going     it was totally worth a freezing walk across an icy bridge to get to this place  The person who took our order was super knowledgable about the menu and I can tell they take a lot of care in preparing the food  He even offered to let us stand by the wood burning stove since we were so cold from our walk over    We got the Rosemary Braised Beef sandwich and New York steak  as well as a side of potatoes  It was all delicious  I think the sauces they offer really make it awesome    As many have said  the hours that they hold are a bit inconvenient   Tues  to Sat        AM  to       PM  Sunday Closed  Monday Closed  There have been many times I wanted to go  but it was already closed  Hopefully they will expand their hours after they renovate  At any rate  if you live in Pittsburgh  and eat meat   you should definitely check this place out

This meat is to die for   We only had to wait about        minutes on a Friday around  pm and our food came to us within another       minutes   I love that there is no corkage fee   We shared the mixta with NY strip  chicken  and chorizo  all great   We also had the Carne sandwich w  filet and carmelized onions  which was also the best steak sandwich I ve ever had   Seriously   GO NOW

How long has this place been hiding in plain sight in the Strip District    I had just crossed over the   th St bridge and bam  There it was  The line was to the door  so I walked around a bit before coming back around      on a Wednesday  Very small line at that time   The menu is a bit huge and overwhelming  but I decided pretty quickly on the Carne sandwich  What I was not prepared for was the cashier then asking me to choose between a whole list of meat cuts  I selected the filet  and I m glad I did    This steak was tremendous  It made me question why I only eat steak     times per year  It made me question my whole life  Cooked medium  it was like biting through soft butter  Excellent feel  excellent flavor  The bread had the right amount of interior softness and exterior crunch  and I m always a fan of caramelized onions  next time I ll probably ask for extra   The sandwich also came with one lone  small pepper right in the middle  and some sauce   Get to the Strip and eat a sandwich that s not Primanti s

Unlike the other reviews we were very lucky and had no wait  The food was fantastic   Thank goodness the staff was extremely helpful in what to order because the menu was a little tough to choose from with a line of people behind you   I suggest checking the menu before you arrive and have some order while you grab a table
The steaks are great  the sauces are a      and the atmosphere is awesome  The line does get long though  so plan ahead  get there early or order takeout to avoid a long line

I was in town visiting my sister in Pittsburgh and yelped a bunch of places  and of course  Gaucho popped up with its   star rating   Pros  I did really like the ribeye sandwich  After reading many Yelp reviews about it  I decided it was worth a try    Cons  Everything else was pretty mediocre  We got the grilled veggie plate  side order of potatoes  rosemary braised beef sandwich  NY strip plate and the fish of the day plate  The rosemary braised beef sandwich was nothing compared to the ribeye sandwich  The potatotes and grilled veggies were soaked in oil  as was most of the food  There was so much char on most of the meat  and it wasn t anything special anyway  The fish was good  but nothing spectacular  There was a huge long line and we had to wait about    minutes until we actually got to eat    Overall  I came to Gaucho with high hopes  but left pretty disappointed  Don t get me wrong  the food is not terribly BAD  but it s not worth the hype  I m surprised that this place has a   star rating  is this the best Pittsburgh has to offer

This restaurant has excellent beef items  If friends visit Pittsburgh and are looking to visit the Strip district and want a casual meat restaurant this is the place to go  They are cooked to perfection  The drawbacks are parking as well as having to wait in line  which at times can be long
Awesome sandwich  I recommend the sandwiches over the plates  I got the carne and it was absolutely delicious
Delicious although the wait outside can be very long  Very casual and not obviously the place for your first date

Amazing   Safe to say this is the best lunch I ve ever had  I got a perfectly cooked steak sandwich  Try it with the sauces  Large portion and great price too  I can t wait until I m back in town to eat there again

This place is delicious  I went on a Wednesday night around   and the line was maybe    people long  not bad    I would avoid peak hours on weekends so your wait isn t too long   I had a flank steak sandwich and potatoes  It was SOOOO good  The sandwich can get a little messy  If you want steak but don t want a mess  I would suggest just ordering the steak  It comes with toast and a side    Everyone at our table loved their food  No complaints   The workers are great  Everyone is very friendly and helpful    BYOB

Holy Hell Pittsburgh  Drop everything you re doing and get down to this place  Doesn t matter how long a line  it is worth any wait  Been eating here since it opened and has never never ceased to amaze  satiate and delight  I mean  how can a place make a slice of grilled bread taste so good  Like that you think about it and crave it and can t believe you are eating it  But they do  To say nothing of the steak  Have gone through a fair portion of the menu but can t beat the steaks served any way you want them  A crown jewel for Pittsburgh dining  Holds its own with anyplace I ve eaten in any city including San Francisco etc where I lived for    years  Just amazing

I wanted to be much more impressed with this place  It just didn t live up to the hype  We figured the long lines meant great food but left feeling like we missed something   all the reviews said the food was super tasty and flavorful but I found it to be bland  I mean  I do have unique tastebuds since I m from the Caribbean  but I felt like I could make better food at home

Dementiel as we said in French   Everything in this place is perfect  the atmosphere of course  the decoration  the staff and last but not least the food  Burger delicioso  chicken  chorizo  pork even the quality of the vinaigrette can be spotted

Gaucho is as good as it gets  The only problem with Gaucho is that it s too popular  and the wait can be ridiculous  I recommend going on a weekday at odd times like  pm if possible to avoid having to wait at all    If it your first time at gaucho  I strongly recommend getting the Asado platter  The Asado platter contains   pieces each of   different types of steak  It s      but it has enough food to feed     people  so not too pricey when you split it  Get it medium rare  Trust me  the way they cook their steak  it s meant to be cooked medium rare  Try the steak by itself and then with their four dipping sauces just to get the whole experience    Even though they re an Argentinian steak place  their vegetable dishes are amazing  I m not much of a vegetable person  but every salad or vegetable dish I ve gotten there blows me away  If you re with     friends  I recommend getting the Asado platter and a large salad and another vegetable dish  It comes out to around         per person    There s no other place more worth it that Gaucho  Nothing in Pittsburgh compares  If you re trying to impress your friends who are visiting  this is the place to take them

If you are willing to wait for a while  you will not be disappointed   The food is really good and you get a great amount for the price   I recommend the pork sandwich with onions and spicy mustard   Great atmosphere and the staff were friendly and helpful   Would go back for sure

Firstly the smell is mouth watering just like their food  Choice of meat  how it s cooked  variety  vegetarians can find food here  I had the carne and it was full of flavor  Thick bread so I pulled some of it out  Will be back for sure

What a wonderful place to catch in the strip district  When in Pittsburgh this is a must have stop  You will always hear the typical if having the Pittsburgh staple Primanti sandwich but this is also one heavy delicious sandwich  I had the ribeye sandwich with grilled corn and it was the best steak sandwich I ve ever had  The employees there are also wonderful  Very friendly and fun atmosphere  It is a small location but if you can catch a seat outside then I would recommend  to do so

This was our first time traveling to Pittsburgh and this was the one restaurant we wanted to try  At first the menu is overwhelming  but the staff came around and offered assistance to help us with our order  There were   of us  so we ordered the Asado Plate to split  It is   cuts of beef  filet mignon  skirt  NY strip  flank and ribeye  cooked to your desired temp  We also ordered the Papas Cuna  which is potato salad  and an order of the mixed vegetables  The food was amazing  This was by far our favorite restaurant that we ate at while in town  Highly recommend going here  Note  they don t serve alcohol  so bring your own wine or beer with you

I always got the sandwiches  I never knew what I was missing until I started ordering off of the entr e menu  That s not to say that the sandwiches are lesser than  but the entr es are so fantastic it s really hard to pass them up  Yes the large size steak on trees and some of the bigger entr es are a little pricey  but the quality of food and preparation totally justifies the price  I m not a huge meat eater  but this place offers incredible slices of red meat and the chicken is fantastic   Totally worth the splurge  The flank steak is to die for  the chicken breast with the garlic sauce all over it is on real  The sides are good  the cauliflower and the broccolini are definitely the best  the potatoes are good but in contrast to the awesome flavors in the meats the potatoes seemed a little lackluster to me  They re supposed to be a sidenote the main show     I ve never ordered the paella  but I ve seen it served and it is a ton of food with lots of yummy things  There s really nothing better than a perfectly cooked cut of meat   It s worth noting that even though this place definitely is carnivorous  their salads are some of the best in the city with or without meat and all of their non meat offerings are done right
Wow  awesome  Just go  Food is incredible for carnivores and omnivores alike  Staff helps guide through the menu as you wait in a line  that is there for very good reason
Fantastic  and a fun dining experience  the slam the counter seating to the self services sauces and silverware make this place a must do when in the burg

Gaucho  a vegan s paradise  Just kidding   If you re not craving a lump of meat that s been resting on a hot grill for several minutes  then you should probably head on over to your local farmer s market or graze the grass in your neighbor s backyard   But if you find happiness in ripping apart dead animal flesh with a fork and knife  dipping it into variety of native south american dipping sauces    flavors to choose from   and sloppily mashing it in between your teeth while beads of sweat drip off your face into the puddle beneath you  then wait no longer   Request that uber  jack a few bottles from your roommate s prized craft beer collection  and call up that cool chick who s down to guzzle some brews  munch on medium rare cow  and crack a few dick jokes   Now that we ve filtered out the gentle  ethical souls from the carnivorous  protein fueled  ruthless beasts  let s get to the nitty gritty with how gaucho works   If you venture down to the strip district on   th and Penn on a Friday or Saturday night  you ll be waiting outside the door for       minutes   The crowd you ll be cuddling with for warmth if you make the trip between November and March will be in the age range of       and will be wearing an assortment of high end peacoats and Nordstrom bought dresses and high heels   Once inside  you make a quick scan of the menu which includes the Vaca section   what cut from the dead cow you look to ingest  sandwich section   what type of dead animal you d like to be placed on your french bagguete  or the salad section   I m not sure what this entails but I m guessing there will be greens  cheese  fruit  and oils all mixed together   as salad is an after thought at this Argentinian meat house   You order at the counter  wait to get seated  sit  eat  guzzle your drinks  byob  and leave   It s loud  crowded  and everyone s drunk  but the food is still the focal point here   Nobody can ignore the high quality meat and flavor which actually comes at a fair price    oz sirloin for    bucks    The waitstaff was friendly and they all seem like cool people         would go back
Amazing steak sandwiches  Loved the atmosphere  Very clean and the service was great  I highly recommend to anyone in the mood for a tasty meat sandwich
Super   All food is great  Little crazy with ordering first then they sit you  but great food and atmosphere

Stopped here for lunch after a long morning  shopping at the Strip   Let me start off by saying the food is pretty darn good  It is inventive and full of flavors  They also have an area of a few homemade sauces  chimichurri  Etc  along the side that you can go get  The bathroom is clean and spacious  though theres only   single person bathrooms  which draw a line quickly when the restaurant fills up  But to me it just wasn t enough to overcome the lackluster experience   First  the menu is huge and written on the wall in chalk  Well  if there s anyone behind you  you have no time to crane your neck enough to be able to pick something that sounds like it would be okay   Then you are given all your drinks up front  while paying and tipping at the register  I didn t know that  So my boyfriend left to get a table and set our bags down  and I was left juggling drinks and my purse and a few shopping bags up the stairs to the dining area  Our food was brought to us  a plus  But  we didn t know how to get a drink refill  do we go back up to the register  Is there a waiter  We were so confused  So we waited and waited and someone came and asked if we wanted refills  and took at least    minutes to bring them back  I am guessing because the restaurant was pretty full and they were also taking food orders out   I also can appreciate quality food and ingredients  but I did think the prices were a bit high on some items  I got the Large melted provolone appetizer for the table  but it came out as   small slices of bread with cheese on it  which we had to cut into pieces to feed all of us  The side of broccolini was   long florets and a couple green onions  I just didn t get it  to be honest  The rosemary beef sandwich was pretty excellent but was too dry without some kind of condiment so I used the homemade chimichurri to dip it in and it definitely elevated the sandwich a bit    Maybe its something I need to get used to  I just didn t realize it was that kind of place from the reviews and from the exterior interior look and feel of the establishment   I might give it a shot again    maybe

On my way to Pittsburgh one of the places that I was really looking forward to was Gaucho  We came here on a Saturday  standing in the line with a    pack as the smell of their wood fired grill was taking over the whole street  Apparently there is always a line here  We waited for    minutes  and yes it is worth it   As I was standing in the line  I couldn t help myself not hearing how locals exalt this place  I ordered their filet sandwich and the rosemary braised beef sandwich  for to go   The winner was the filet  but with a small difference  The first bite that I took from my filet sandwich  was overwhelmingly tasty  The meat was cooked to perfection  and the roasted peppers in the sandwich had this unbelievable smoky flavor which added a lot to the sandwich  The sandwiches here are served on ciabatta which makes them even more delicious    As far as the appetizers go here  we got the Caldo del Mar  seafood soup  and the Papas Cuna  potato salad    Both were truly mouth watering and tasty  The Papas Cuna is a must  Probably one of the best potato salad I ve ever had  I have no idea how can a potato salad taste so rich and creamy    The service here is relatively fast  and the staff here are very friendly  You order at the register  and sit yourself and they bring it to you  The atmosphere inside is trendy  and pretty cool  But  again I don t think it s necessarily for me to talk more about the atmosphere  Who goes there for the atmosphere  I wish we had Gaucho in the Bay Area

The food here is delicious  but the last couple times I have been here it seems like the size of the sandwich is continually decreasing  I usually get the rosemary beef  and when I first started eating here the sandwich was almost twice the size it is now  I m not sure it s worth what they charge any more  very disappointing

Amazing food   super friendly staff  The first time I stopped in  I was surprised at how affordable it was   I ve only dined inside so far   it s been perfect   comfy  clean  pleasant atmosphere  Can t wait to visit again in the warmer weather to try out their outdoor dining
I ll admit I was skeptical  is this place  really  that good  Um  yup  And they re not pretentious about it  Go early  tho  Even though the line moves quickly  it gets insanely long

Absolutely incredible  Efficiently run restaurant with an incredible menu  I had the blue marlin pescado sandwich with the cheesy toast and roasted potatoes  which were all amazing  Would definitely recommend  well be back

This is a unsung gem in Pittsburgh   While the set up is a bit unconventional the food is great  When you come in you stand in a line and order off a wall sized chalkboard menu then pay  They then seat you after you order  It s a byob location  The food is so unique and delicious  Give this place a try

It tastes as good as it smells when you walk by   Had the cerdo  roast pulled pork   which was amazing   The cut of meat  execution of the smoking  and mild rosemary flavor were all top shelf   Cookies were good too   Be sure to load up on the free dipping sauces  as they are also amazing   This deserves to be the highest rated restaurant in Pittsburgh on Yelp  guess this region has better tastes than Ann Arbor  M

Come visit if you re in Pittsburgh  Wanted to give a     stars  but they don t have an option for that unfortunately  This is some honest to goodness Argentinian food that will satiate the meat cravings that everybody has once in a while   We ordered the asado plate  a sampler of all the meats for      along with   empanadas       one of the beef and one of the vegetarian kind  You get a    or    oz total of NY strip  flank  sirloin  ribeye  and filet mignon  we asked for medium rare  but some of the pieces were cooked a bit more well done   no complaints here     You can dip the meats in   different sauces  the chimichurri sauce is honestly the best  along with a couple loaves of bread that is little bit too burnt for my liking  The empanadas were great  especially the beef empanada  but the vegetarian one is somewhat bland and may have needed some more flavoring   Overall  a great experience and good place to bring a date  I recommend you come early to avoid a line  we went at around          PM on a weekday

Probably one of my favorite restaurants anywhere  To say the food is great would be an understatement  Everything is fresh and full of flavor  If you havent been here  go  Its easy to see why theres always a line around the block to get into the place  but once you do  you wont be disappointed

I m not really sure of all the hype about this place  Went for lunch with a few co workers a few weeks ago  There was probably   people in front of us in line and it took about    minutes to order  Not super slow  but alright  The menu has a nice variety  but I could tell people had trouble deciphering it  I ordered the flank steak platter and proceeding to find a place to sit  The only seats available were these strange  low benches  Nobody wants to eat on something like that  let s be honest  Anyway  it took us a long time to get our food  We were waiting at least    minutes  My friend who ordered first  a chicken sandwich  ended up getting her food about    minutes after the rest of us and we were almost done by then     minutes for a chicken sandwich at lunchtime is ridiculous  Overall  I liked my food  It was tasty and I enjoyed the sauces  My friends chicken sandwich was on bread that completely black  She said it was pretty bland and she found a few bones  My other friend got a fish sandwich and complained it didn t have much flavor   Overall  I think it s a little pricey for what you get and over hyped

I thought the food was excellent   The meats were cooked to perfection we ordered one of the steak dishes and the rosemary braised beef sandwich which was huge  I wish i ordered a whole bowl of the salad   I been dreaming of this salad since I got back from my trip  All of the condiments were amazing     The people cooking the food were friendly and waiving to all the patrons   Why i took off two stars was because the person taking my order was rude   The girl who rang up my order rolled her eyes at me because we didn t finish our order in the time i m guessing she allotted for   Driving   hours and looking forward to eating this place as our first stop in the burgh I let one of the runners know that and how delicious it was and all i got was a stare and she didn t acknowledge anything i said   I guess we weren t hipster enough

The burger was delicious   Not your typical American hamburger   It s super flavorful  big  you can split with someone   and has a great crusty bread instead of a bun   Price is well worth it  but expect to wait in line since the restaurant is so popular

Instead of some lackluster happy hour  go to the state store  get a heavy Chilean Red and your whiskey of choice  and get your hangry ass to Gaucho before  pm on a weekday   If it s your first time  the front of house experience is a bit awkward  It s not bad  it s just weird  You order at the counter as a group  but can split your check  After that  you can order more from your table and get table service  Tip well and be loved  The entire staff splits tips  I wish they d just raise prices and wages  but we re just not there yet as a nation  One thing at a time   Look at the menu ahead of time and know what you want  For the love of god  don t keep Pittsburgh waiting outside for Gaucho because you were live tweeting the wait instead of thinking about what you wanted to eat  you heathen  Or Snapchatting  You were snapping  weren t you  On that note  this place is small  Please be considerate of those in line once you recover from the meat sweats    Open the wine  You can t go wrong here  but get the flank steak and carrots  The flank steak is impressive but the carrots are a spiritual experience  You can eat the large  but get the small because bread pudding  Get rare to medium or you re dead to me  Try all the sauces but you only need ajo  garlic sauce  for your toast  Finish the wine or give the rest to a table in need    Walk down to Leaf   Bean  open the whiskey  and revel in the privilege of a cool summer s eve in the city o  ahrn  If you don t know what you like  get a Leaf by Oscar with the Connecticut wrapper  Enjoy  but do not finish the whiskey  Get home safe

This is one of my absolute favorite places in the city to grab a bite to eat   Argentinian grilled meats are delicious no matter what the type  The sandwiches are unbelievable but sitting down and grabbing some of the entrees the menu offers is the move at this place  The flank steak here is to die for  and don t forget the chimichurri
Great food   Worth the wait   Staff is friendly and helpful   Well thought out  nice touch is the wine glasses for the BYOB customers  and NO CORKAGE FEE   I shall return

Popped in while looking for a quick bite  This place is simply amazing  Isabel was great in guiding us towards the beast meats and explained in detail the different cuts  We opted for flank steak with fungos and vegetables and we couldn t be more happy   Great meal  best in Pittsburgh so far

Honestly    worth the wait  My husband said the wait is the only thing he d take stars off for  but he hates waiting more than    mins for anything so    The warnings about the line are real   expect to wait at least       minutes  We came on Cinco de Mayo weekend by accident  and this area of Pittsburgh has a weekend market going on  anyways  so parking was rough and the line was already winding around the building  We still only waited a little over    minutes  though  so I d call that a win    The prices are fair  especially for the amount of food that you get  but it s my opinion that you should skip the platters and just go for the sandwiches  Would maybe change my mind if I got the asada platter or the paella  but those are things I d get only with a hungry group of friends  For just me  the steak sandwich   some empanadas are more than enough  Speaking of which  I want to shout out the empanadas    I ve never had Argentinian empanadas and was expecting the Mexican masa variety  but these are more of a bread dough and almost more like an Asian bao   Super good and wish we got more  at first  I was a little underwhelmed by how small they seemed  but with the bready dough and dense filling  they were the right amount of filling     Also  big ups to the sauces    all of them are great  but the standouts are the chimmichuri  obviously previously raved about  and the smoked pepper  Honestly would have taken more to go if I wasn t so worried about little sauce containers spilling in my car    Overall  great experience that genuinely feels local and warm  The service is great   efficient and used to dealing with crowds  love that they find your group tables so no one can hog reserve more space than necessary  and extremely friendly  Looking forward to coming back  hopefully with a shorter line  and trying more on the menu
Absolutely my favorite place to come to when I visit Pittsburgh  The flavors are amazing  you can t go wrong with any meal

I can t say enough about this place  I LIVE for empanadas and these are soooooooo good  The braised beef is    making me drool thinking about it now  Shrimp was perfect  And the house made chimichurri sauces are yum   This place is always busy  as it should be because it s awesome  Plan to be patient  And enjoy

Unbelievable food  I make an effort to stop here whenever I m in Pittsburgh  Delicious smoked meats and a great selection of authentic chimichuri  At lunch hours there is a line out the door so it is best to visit at an off lunch hour time

This is a hole in the wall in the strip district  the website photos are  shall we say  optimistic   But the food is delicious  So far the best I ve had in Pittsburgh  better than Salt  Spoon  Soba  Point Bruge  etc    High quality meats  good spices  and all really fresh  Probably not something to eat on a low sodium diet but delicious

Simply the best steak sandwich in pittsburgh  The meat is amazing and the staff friendly and helpful  The gentleman working the counter even offered to come around to explain all the chef s homemade sauces to us  I will be back again and again

OMG  What can I say   The food is awesome  We started off with the Provoletta  delicious   and then had the NY strip large plate and the Camarones  shrimp  large plate   Husband and I shared  and loved both meals  Each plate had buttery toasted bread and a leafy salad   The center table had   different sauces to choose   All were wonderful   Every bite of food is nicely seasoned   Wanted to try the potatoes but they had ran out and didn t know if they would be ready for the meal so we had to pass on them   We almost walked out because there are only several stools to sit on or you can stand at the small table in the center but the aroma kept us there   There were non stop people coming in too   But we honestly didn t wait all that long   The good news is they are renovating the bldg next door which is supposed to be the restaurant part and where they are currently is going to be just the kitchen

Wow  We weren t so happy to have to wait in the cold in order to get inside  but WOW was this worth the wait  We got the Asado Platter  the Parrillada Mixta  with spicy chorizo   and a small steak plate  because there wasn t already enough meat      along with the Papas al Horno and Roasted Spaghetti Squash  The food was phenomenal  The meat was perfectly cooked and seasoned  and the sides were a great complement to the meats  And it s BYOB without any fee  so you really can t complain about that   We had a few dietary restrictions in our group  no gluten  no dairy   but the staff was very knowledgeable and they were able to easily accommodate us   We will definitely be returning to enjoy more of the delicious food
Best pollo in town  Friendly staff  affordable price with amazing food    Dont miss to try out their house special sauces

My boyfriend and I went here last minute on a Saturday  If you plan ahead and go at non peak times  the line isn t too long and the food comes out relatively quickly  We had chicken  beef  and vegetable empanadas which were all fantastic  We also had   orders of tostado with all   different types of sauces  you can get any kind you want which is cool    I really loved this place and thought it was very authentic and super yummy  If you hate long lines  just plan ahead and you ll be fine  but I think it s worth the wait

Worth waiting  I had the seafood soup and corn pudding  and I try the gilled chicken from the bbq mixta  The chicken was so good  The others are good too  My don t eat beaf but my friend told me it s good  I have to say everything is better than what I had in Argentina

This place is awesome    Best place for steaks in Pittsburgh  I got a filet mingon sandwich and it was done perfectly  The seasoning that they use on their meats is great  They use a lot of rosemary which adds a lot of flavor  I only wish that they were open later during the week and I wish that they were open on Sundays

This restaurant is such a great addition to the strip district  Their food is fresh and inexpensive  We enjoyed the grilled shrimp  salad  and filet  The BYOB is a plus and the atmosphere is fun  The staff was awesome and very helpful when figuring out what to order  Only down side was that the food wasn t hot

No matter what time of the day going here starts with a line  Yes the food is amazing  but the line especially if it rains or it is cold is annoying  sorry  The good thing is  when you get in the door the process of ordering and getting a table is quick  We had the Carne and the Rosemary Braised Beef Sandwich  both good but the Rosemary was my favorite  the bread is really good too  We also tried the Chorizos and Empanadas both flavorful and delicious  My absolute favorite comes last we had Nutella Breadpudding and Horchata Ricepudding if your a Dessert lover you have to have it

One the best restaurants this city has to offer  Made even better by the pleasant staff  Despite the crowds and he lines they are always super happy and helpful  The rosemary braised beef sandwhich is amazing

I really have never been to a place like Gaucho  I was in town for the Steelers game and saw all of the glowing reviews on yelp  I felt compelled to comment on my experience  This was a regular lunch spot with high end meats  We do not have anything like this back here in Chicago   We waited maybe    minutes  which wasn t bad  This place was absolutely worth the wait  some guy told us the same thing walking out   We ordered the Asado Plate  which were all   cuts of the steaks they offered  It included Flank  NY strip  Ribeye  Filet    Sirloin  which were all incredible  My favorites were definitely the Ribeye and NY strip  The item on the menu  though  that made me feel compelled to write a review was the rack of lamb  I feel that if you add Lamb to your menu at any restaurant  you know what you are doing in prepping and preparing meats  This New Zealand Lamb was cooked perfectly and was the highlight of my trip  We also split a side of the veggies    Overall  I would have to say this was one of my top   lunchtime meals that I ve had in my life  Maybe  even  top   meals regardless of the time of day  No exaggeration  If you are in Pittsburgh you have to hit up this spot  I will be back next time I visit Pittsburgh

I mean  obviously this review is going to be five star like every other review  So yummy  I was visiting Pittsburgh and our Uber driver recommended this place  When I yelped restaurants later on  it ended up also coming up  Sunday we decided to go  but turned out to be closed  Decided to go next day  Monday  but was closed to  We were able to eat before we headed out of Pittsburgh on Tuesday and it did not disappoint  We sat outside and our dog was welcomed and given a cold drink as well  Staff is very nice

We went here for the first time for my husbands birthday this year  When we arrived we had already known there would be a wait  considering it s very popular and there s always a line  We waited about a hour and finally got up to order  We ordered the meat platter with all   types of steak  Our favorite part about trying the meats is to see which we like the best  and to compare  It was a little disappointing when the food finally came out  they had forgot to label each meat  The waiter that delivered it also didn t know which was which    so we just ate a big pile of meat lol  Made it a little fun trying to guess what each cut was   The food was EXCELLENT though regardless of not knowing what we were exactly eating  Will be returning again
This place has amazing steak  Good prices  excellent variety  Make sure to bring a nice bottle of wine with you  Will not be disappointed

Tiny restaurant on the corner at the far end of the Strip District  You can smell the delicious smoke from half a block away  When you walk in the  the staff is extremely friendly and give their advice on what to order  I went hungry and left extremely full with left overs  We ordered a side of potatoes because the empanada maker was sadly out of order and this was enough for both of us to share  I ordered the rosemary braised beef with caramelized onions and horseradish sauce and it came on a nice soft roll  I will say that I wish that there was a little more horseradish but I just know for next time what to ask for  My husband ordered the rib eye with peppers  onions and chimmi churri sauce on a hard roll and he loved it    If you re looking to go as a group or to sit down  just note that there are bar stools and small counters inside  They do have outdoor seating but depending on the weather  you may just want to take your food to go or back to your office   Thoroughly impressed and would highly recommend  The smells alone will get you to walk in

So this place was good  don t get me wrong  The food came out well presented  and definitely tasty  but it was cold  I ordered a rib eye and it tasted like it had been left out on the counter for a few hours  After all the crazy raving reviews I had heard about this place  it definitely did not live up to expectations  We ordered a side of roasted red potatoes each and no one at the counter informed us that it was a larger helping that could definitely be shared  Needles to say  we didn t finish either  Bummed about this place for sure

I came here because of all the good reviews but left the restaurant with disappointment  I ordered sirloin and lamb rack and both were extremely bitter to me because the meat and bread were burnt  The flavor was nothing special  and the sirloin was very chewy  Lamb had good texture  but the bitterness ruined everything  I don t even think it s safe to consume food that is burnt like this   Anyways  I probably would not come here again  I really don t understand why there are so many good reviews
Sooooooo good  Service was great  Totally worth the wait  The best only bad thing  is that I now want one of those sandwiches like everyday  Haha
This place has excellent steak and the smell is amazing   There can be a long wait  but it s worth it

My mouth is watering thinking about the time I ate here  There s a great selection of items on the menu  Only complaint is that they don t take reservations   and because this place is popular  it means long lines at times  But trust me  the food is worth it  Not only is the meat and food great  but so are the chimmis  free and unlimited   their homemade sauces   which you can actually purchase to bring home    Food     Parrillada Mix  NY Strip Steak  Grilled Chicken  and Chorizo with toast   Beans   Greens  onions  shallots  white beans  wilted greens  and grilled lemon   Eggplant  chilled and marinated grilled eggplants  poblanos  garlic  oregano  sherry vinegar
Long wait for good food but not great  There are a lot of rules you have to follow too  I didn t like any of the sauces

Best food in Pittsburgh bar none  BYOB with no corkage fee is a nice added bonus   Whenever I have a visitor from out of town I make sure to bring them to Gaucho and they always love it  Waiting in line can be a little rough but give you the time to chitchat cause when the food comes out  it goes silent with people chowing down  Takeout is an option if you don t like waiting   My favorites from here    Chorizo  I wish I had known how delicious it was the first   or so times I ve visited     Carne  steak sandwich with grilled onions peppers

For the last few years  this place has been ridiculously good receiving all kinds of attention in the news and on social media  but more recently  I think the food quality has slipped a notch or two specifically at their restaurant   It seems like they have their best grill masters working their Asado wagon which frequents local microbreweries each week spring through fall   I want to give Gaucho five stars on here  but they are not currently there

Hands down one of the best restaurants in the  burgh   If you re looking for a fancy meal  this ain t it  but the food is unreal  Make sure to go at an off time   meaning  not at lunch time during the week or dinner on the weekend  or be prepared to wait

Beautiful food  Beautiful space  Wonderful service   Absolutely awesome concept  Argentinian meats sandwiches salads  We got the steak sandwich with flank  you get to chose your cut  for     and the rosemary beef brisket with horseradish     and roasted corn on the cob       Steak sandwich was impeccable  amazing bread  chimichurri  high quality meat with a char that I ll be drooling about for days and deliciously grilled veggies    Brisket sandwich was also tasty  my only complaint was that I wish there was about  x the amount of horseradish sauce  I was so into that sauce  y all    Corn on da cob was amazing  Grilled to perfection and served with the husk    HUGE portions as well   I loved my experience here  I will be rushing back

Updating my review of the newer  bigger space    Ample seating and review still holds true  Out of the   times I ve come  there was only   time I didn t have to wait but trust me  you ll be very much rewarded for your patience   The meat is perfectly cooked and stick to your guns  if you like rare go for it because they will get it perfect  Your veggies will be beautifully grilled and charred right to the point before it has that burnt taste  The   house made sauces will delight every part of your palate and try all   and see which one you like the best  The bread is always so crisp yet chewy   lightly brushed with olive oil  use it to soak up all the meat juice   I m getting hungry typing this but for all you people who can visit whenever  I envy you all  This is a must eat in Pittsburgh

Every  Single  Time  That s how often Gaucho is awesome  I work in the Strip District and I love eating meat  This means I eat there super often  And honestly  Every single time I do  it s amazing   Flavorful  perfectly cooked beef  Check  Amazing  succulent chicken  Check  Delicious and abundant sides  Check   It s always crowded but they have a nice seating area in the back now  they ve expanded  and they have an equally nice patio seating area during nice weather  Some might consider it expensive when compared to other lunch or dinner dining options in the area  there s a    delicious pho joint right down the street   but MAN do you get what you pay for    Go there  If the line is around the corner  which is often is  wait in it patiently  You will be rewarded with tasty meat treats
