direction while speaking and I felt too uncomfortable to ask him to repeat himself  My date ventured off to find the boxes and was only able to find tiny boxes   definitely not big enough to fill with absurd amount of rice we now had for the week  As a side note   the paella is noted to be big enough for     people  I knew this while ordering and it does not negatively impact my feelings on the food restaurant itself  Luckily another wait staff member saw our tiny box dilemma and brought us two normal sized boxes which I was grateful for  He was also the only member who seemed genuinely courteous and professional as I watched him interact with other patrons  Also not really part of the review since it s not that kind of restaurant but I figured I d mention it    Overall  I was left unimpressed and probably won t return  Other people s food looked pretty good but I can only comment on my experience  If anyone reading is feeling daring and wants to try the paella for themselves I would recommend bringing some adobo along

Not from Pittsburgh but I have heard a lot of great things about the place so I knew I had to check it out  Turns out to be well worth the hype and the wait  A    minute wait to order during lunch   I couldn t make up my mind on what I wanted so I got the beef empanadas and the spicy chorizo sausage with toast   The empanadas were filled very well and crispy with a lot of flavor packed in  Definitely something I would be getting again and among the best empanadas I ve ever had   The spicy chorizo didn t feel too hot at first but it had great late kick to it and was exactly what I was hoping for    They had a bunch of other things on the menu that I would like to try another time  so I can guarantee that I ll be back on my next trip into town

Amazing  A Pittsburgh favorite and must try  Love the food here  Genuine wood fired in an open faced kitchen so you can see where the magic happens  Some of the tastiest meats and sides I ve ever had  They DO NOT TAKE RESERVATIONS  so be prepared for lines around the block    even in inclement weather  It s BYOB too    I like to bring a nice bottle of Argentinian Malbec  Always a must visit spot to bring guests from out of town  Has a young  hip vibe to it  freshly renovated space  loud  robust atmosphere  nothing fancy  Low key and relaxed but the food easily rivals some of the higher price point restaurants in the city  GO TO GAUCHO  You won t regret it

Are you like me that you want to save your last bite for your favorite food  That s impossible here  Everything is perfect  I was working on the roasted potatoes  ribeye  and sour dough bread at the end of my meal and it was impossible  Come eat here  You won t be disappointed

This place has the best food in Pittsburgh  Hands down  I would even put my hands back up again  so I can hands down again  Whether you are visiting or a burgher in the flesh  GO TO GAUCHO NOW    I am blown away by Gaucho and their incredible food  We walked in intending to eat in there but its not big enough for that  We took it over to the Beer Market in the North Shore and just raved about every bite  We all got sandwiches and since there were   of us all ordering different items on the menu  I can say I tried a lot of them  I couldn t tell which one I loved the best  I think   are tied for first  Is that possible   The sandwiches were filling but we also got some potatoes and veggies  Potatoes were a little underdone  but the veggies were perfect

Food is awesome at this place   The toughest part about it is sometimes they get super busy and the wait time can get pretty long   I ve been a couple of times for lunch during off hours and got right in though   The flank steak is incredible and I love all the different sauce options

Always a wait and with good reason  I went for lunch and had the rosemary braised beef sandwich which was quite a lot with fresh ciabatta bread  excellent  We started with empanadas which had a nice crusty shell  These were tasty  We split a side of the roasted potatoes which were well prepared and quite a large side  The sandwiches are quite large and probably could be split between   people  The service was very good and we left very happy  Highly recommended

Absolutely fantastic and satisfying food  Options for vegetarians as well as all the carnivorous delights  The seating situation is a bit frustrating but it s a popular restaurant for a reason and to be expected

THE Question to ask yourself at this place is  does the good food make up for the Mean Nazi like seating system that requires customers to wait outside in    degree temps   and don t block the effing  entrance  versus being seated in any of the abundant empty tables    The old man acting bossy boss was downright rude from the moment I walked in   How bout kindly saying  hey  do you mind sitting at a bar stool till your food is ready   I m seating people who have gotten food already in these tables     my spouse was in line ordering instead he was aggressive and rude  Stupid system and mean customer service   Rudeness can easily outweigh good food   Answer   not worth it

Ate here for lunch a month back  Got there right when it opened  And good thing  the line when we left was out the door  I would say its worth the wait  One of the best sandwiches I ve had  maybe the best  And the chimichurri is AWESOME

I love steak and Gaucho is a great place for it  We shared the Asado Platter    pieces of Empanadas  and the Veggie Plate between   of us  This was the perfect amount and we were all decently full after the meal despite getting HUNGRY from the wait  We came at around  pm on a Friday and had to wait about    minutes before we could put in our order and be seated   The steak was very flavorful and came perfectly medium rare as we had requested  If anything  some of the pieces were more on the raw side  which I didn t mind but some people might  I loved that I was able to try all the different cuts  and since all   of us had different favorites  I was able to get a few pieces of my favorite cuts   The empanadas weren t bursting with flavor but they were tasty in a homey way  especially the pastry part  For      I expected the Veggie Plate to be a bit bigger  but the vegetables were delicious  My friend who normally dislikes veggies became a veggie monster   Gaucho is a good place to have a bit of good steak for a decent price and still have enough left in your budget to get a little bit of something else  I can see myself coming back next time I m in the area

My friend and I were looking for a fun  ethnic restaurant in Pittsburgh  We spotted this place and although we had to wait outside in the long line  all of the food that we tried was definitely worth the wait  The chimichurri sauce was some of the best I ve ever had  The meat was so well cooked and everything that we tasted was amazing  I can t wait to go back

Ahhhhhhmazing  I was out with some people at the history center and we all caught the hungry train so we jetted down to the strip and snuck into this place  It was crowded but the smells coming out of the kitchen were worth the rather quick wait to the register to order  There were five of us there so one person ran outside by the place to secure a spot to sit so by the time we all ordered we had enough chairs to sit down and enjoy  I got the carne sandwich with lomo and it was more than enough to fulfill my dreams  I enjoyed every bite and intend to go back to try the rest of the menu  Highly recommend

Super fresh tasting food  BYO  Order at counter  Vibe of restaurant is laid back  unrushed  I d check menu before hand  Lots to choose from and hard to decide at a counter when you re in a line with people waiting behind you  The chimmi sauces are really clean and fresh tasting  Got the Gaucho salad and had some toast and broccolini   Even though there s a lot of meat on menu  you can go all veggie and be super satisfied

Wow   I ve never had anything like this  so delicious  I got the Carne sandwich with flank steak and it was so flavorful  The atmosphere was really cool and the employees were really helpful in pointing out their recommendations which ensured this great meal  My husband got the rosemary braised beef sandwich and it was so good too  We re not sure whose sandwich was better  but boy did they hit the spot on a cold day

I ve had this place a few times but the way my mom and aunt talked about me yesterday you d think I was a pro  I knew every answer to their questions  first timers always have questions lol  yesterday my mom and I split the ribeye steak  medium well  the pork chop  well done  the roasted potatoes with rosemary and the summer squash with breadcrumbs  The steak was flavorful and tender but it had parts that were a little too pink in certain areas and in other areas had too much char for me but in general it was a tasty steak   I got the bone part of the chop and loved it  it was juicy and delicious while my mom s main part was a little on the dryer but still tender  The squash was perfectly cooked and the bread crumbs on top were garlicky  which I like and crunchy  The potatoes could have been a little hotter because we asked for a side of butter and the butter wasn t really melting but not a big deal  I work at a hotel downtown and suggest it to anyone who will  listen    Long story short this place is worth the line you ll probably have to wait in to eat so go early and try the sauces they are all FABULOUS

Long wait and they don t serve wine  there   Website does not mention this    If you don t know it s BYOB then you re wine less in an Argentine  restaurant which  in Argentina would never be acceptable   Writing this for FYI for future customers
Got the lomo con pan  filet beef sandwich   Meat was like red bubblegum  Way too much fat  Couldn t eat it at all  The charm was definitely lost during the renovations  Service was pleasant
Best food in Pittsburgh  Their steak sandwiches are awesome and totally worth the price  Also  they recently expanded the size of the restaurant so it can fit more people
GREAT    Be prepared to wait there is always a line which speaks to how good the food is
Fives all around  Great price  great food  byob  Can t beat that  They keep the crowd moving  Be sure to try the rosemary beef sandwich

My boyfriend and I had been trying to go to Gaucho for the longest time  but the line was always out the door and down the side of the building  But recently  we found out why  We went on a Saturday around      or so  There was a wait but it was completely reasonable  I think we waited    minutes tops  The staff was communicative to the crowd  stating they were waiting for more tables to open up before they seated other customers    We got up to order our food and I ordered the chicken sandwich and my boyfriend ordered the pulled pork  We also got some empanadas to try  We sat at a table and decided to try out some of the sauces they had before our food came  The red pepper sauce is to die for  we actually took some home because we liked it so much  When our food came  we couldn t eat it fast enough  I added avocado to the chicken sandwich and it went perfectly with everything on the sandwich  The portions were huge and we were both full after each eating a half of a sandwich  As for the empandas  they were fantastic and a must have  I tried the veggie one which had goat cheese in it  The goat cheese was a nice addition and added freshness  I highly recommend a visit to Gaucho  I will be returning soon
Must eat in Pittsburgh  I brought all my friends who visited Pittsburgh for the first time here and they all love it  My go to is the steak platter and empanadas

Wow  Now I understand all the five star reviews  If you ve ever taken a bite out of a steak sandwich  and the whole thing came out  you ll appreciate the sandwiches at Gauchos    I had the Carne con Pan with the Ribeye steak  pictured in front  Hubby had the Braised Beef with horsey sauce  pictured in the back of my photo    Hubby also went back for a second ear of corn  it was that good    Definitely recommend  And I ll most certainly be back

Just what this place needs    another   star review   What can I say   The people working are super nice and sweet The meat is out of this world incredible The sauces make you melt The bread is squishy and chewy and full of flavor The veggies are crisp and grilled to perfection  Believe the hype   Go there now

The food was very average   I felt like I spent way too much on something that I could have prepared better at home  On our way out the door we noticed that it smelled like a dirty mop  It was just not worth the money or the trip

I have eaten here several times since moving to Pittsburgh last summer  and it never fails to disappoint  Hands down my favorite go to restaurant for bringing friends visiting from out of town  and also one I ll readily recommend to anyone asking for a new place to try  The concept is pretty simple  Argentinian style restaurant where pretty much everything is grilled  You can t go wrong with a classic steak plate  you choose the cut  they ll cook it to your preference  and it comes with chimichurri  salad  and grilled bread  The additional sides they offer are often changing  but always to die for  My favorite as of late are the roasted potatoes and garlic  those cloves are cooked to perfection and I could eat them all day  garlic breath included   and the honey glazed carrots with goat cheese  They also offer some fun traditional desserts  Thankfully most of their stuff is naturally gluten free  and I usually get a steak plate without the grilled bread  It may seem expensive at first glance  but I guarantee it is      worth it

I had an high expectation when I visited Gaucho   However  I was kind of disappointed with their seating and waiting system   I have nothing to say about their food    The food was amazing but seating was confusing   I hope they improve their system

I waited in line on a Saturday for no less than    minutes  I waited no less than    minutes afterwards for my two platters and sandwiches  We ate outside in    degree weather  And I m STILL giving them   stars  This food is great  Load up on sauces and enjoy

What can I say  Gaucho is amazing  You re going to have to wait in line  but that s a given and it s well worth it  My best suggestion is to go at an  off  time  for both of my Gaucho experiences I ve arrived around   or   in the afternoon and the line is pretty manageable    You can t go wrong with the steak plates  which come in small    oz  or large     oz   They come with a Gaucho salad and bread  The steak sandwich is also amazing if you re in the mood for a sandwich  You can pile the sandwich up with just about any topping you d like  Additionally  they do different empanadas daily  we tried the chicken and they were pretty yummy    After getting seated and while waiting for your food  load up on all of the sauces  They re all delicious in their own way  but the chimi is my go to  By the time you have your sauces  your food will arrive  It s crazy fast  which is great after waiting in a long line of anticipation    The only thing I noticed is their meat is a bit under cooked  I always order a medium steak  but at Gaucho I would go with a medium well just to make sure the meat isn t too red    Another win for Gaucho is their food truck Asado which can be found at popular breweries in the area throughout the week

I m not sure what the hype is about this restaurant  It s crazy to wait in line forever in the cold  Food was average  nothing out of the blue   definitely NOT worth the wait   Food      Service      Ambience
Truly incredible food   Any of their meat dishes are excellent  The newly remodeled and re opened space is beautiful and allows for indoor seating

Perfect   Friendly atmosphere and just top notch food   The steak sandwich  the camerones  the grilled vegetables  etc   The best I can say about it is that I am so torn between wanting to tell the world about this place and wanting to keep it my little secret   Highly recommended

The food is sooo good  I just wish the restaurant was different  they don t take reservations  don t have waiters  you have to get your own plates and silverware    It makes things so complicated  Also  since the place is so popular you might end up having to stand outside for an hour or more just to eat  It s just too complicated  I want to have a nice dinner  not a stressful one which is what I get after standing outside in line and having to serve myself
Everything is great  Just be warned that the lamb dinner is three scrumptious but tiny medallions  You will be left chewing the bones for more food

Best place in the Burgh by far  Food is amazing and the flavor is just as good  if not better  than the restaurants I visited in Argentina   Not only is the food great  the staff is awesome as well  If you haven t tried it yet  this one is must visit

After attending CMU from            I was not expecting to find a place like Gaucho   Maybe I matured past bar food  maybe Pixburgh has really stepped into its own  or maybe a combination of both   Any which way  this is a must stop destination after you get in your obligatory run through Primanti s   My gf and I ordered the asado platter  all five cuts of steak    there was no way we were going to limit ourselves to a couple cuts   We also got empanadas  a side of grits  and a side of greens   Obviously the steak was the best part of the meal   Very cool experience to taste the subtle differences and textures between the different cuts   highly recommend   Also  gotta love the bread on top   The grits and greens were standard  not a must order but you will want some type of flavor break from the mound of meat   The empanadas were good  but ultimately it s hard for anything to hold a candle to the steak

The food was absolutely outstanding  We had the pork chops  shrimp   empanada   and meat and cheese plate   Probably in the top ten places I have eaten    This place really makes fine dining accessible   We will be back again       tomorrow
Good food  My hubby and I got ourselves some steak me flanks and him ribeye  The sauces were so good  We had to order extra toasts because we can stop dipping on them  Will def eat again

Some of the best food you can get in Pittsburgh  They often have great desserts too  You can t go wrong with any dish  paella  chicken  steak  potatoes  it s all good  The portions are also pretty large  we always go home with leftovers  The staff are always friendly and energetic  Of course  this is a busy place  but if you plan to go on a weekday evening it s not as bad and the wait isn t too long
Unbelievably good  We ll definitely be coming back   Ordered the Rosemary Braised Beef Sandwich as well as some Empanadas
This my favorite restaurant in Pittsburgh  I m so sad that i didn t know it the time I moved here

I would eat here daily if I lived here   It was incredible   Try the corn when in season  And BYOM  Bring Your Own Malbec    I had the flank steak salad and it was KILLER   The bacon on my date s BLT was smoked on that magic grill to perfection   Happiness ensued

I REALLY did not want to like this place      The line was long and we had to wait outside   I thought it was strange you ordered and paid before you sat down    But I LOVED IT   The food  wow  the food   amazing  Gotta go with the meat   My girlfriend and I split the large sirloin   I definitely recommend getting it medium   It is served with toast  salad  and a steak sauce   Delicious is an understatement   The meat is tender  and that portion alone was massive     We also split an order of the wings   The wings were huge  as they were five full wings     total    I recommend using their homenade sauces on top of them  as they can be a bit crispy  not quite burnt   Then we each had a chicken empanada  which if you put their homemade garlic sauce on   epic    My girlfriend and I are the type who like to leave a restaurant full  and typically finish everything on our plates   Here  we had leftovers  just to give an idea of how much food it really is     All that food was just       ONLY       Finally  we heard amazing things about their dessert  so we had to indulge   We split the cheesecake   Best dessert I have had in a long  long time     So  even though I REALLY wanted to hate this place  I ended up loving it   Keep in mind  my girlfriend and I went at      on a Wednesday and still did not get our food until       I cannot imagine what the line is like on a weekend

Love this place  Last time was there had a spicy chorizo sandwich and red potatoes  Sauces were all great atmosphere is great and it s incredibly close to home  I get confused as to if it s more like a serve yourself restaurant or a full service  However this doesn t dampen the food  If you like meat or you just like great food in general  go here

Definitely a   star restaurant   The line went quick and the staff is very friendly and knowledgeable on the menu   The steak was well seasoned and cooked to perfection   The salad and potatoes were a perfect side and the right amount   I will return to try this place for dinner

After reading about how great his restaurant was  my girlfriend and I went here and have been making it a monthly destination since   While the seating situation isn t really optimal  the quality of food and the attitude of the people working there really makes up for it   There s something great about having an expertly cooked steak sandwich while you smell the wood that they use to fire their grills   The food is a little on the expensive side  but as long as you can get a seat it s definitely worth it to come here   I d recommend coming a bit off of normal eating hours since it quickly gets mobbed on the weekends
This place is overrated  My steak sandwich was burnt  The vietnamese restaurant nearby has better sandwich

I read a lot of hype about this place so we decided to check it out   The line was extremely long  wrapping around the building   It was over an hour wait just to get in the front door      I was told they would like for us to be seated outside on a patio area next door to their business building   They told us it had nothing to do with us having a service dog  however with a line wrapped around the building  nobody else occupying several tables on the patio except for us  it did seem that way     We specifically asked when putting our order in at the front counter if we should order extra sodas now or if someone would be by to refill our drinks on the patio   They assured us that someone would be by to check on us and refill drinks   That didn t happen  nobody checked on us once  while our drinks sat empty     The food was mediocre   I didn t think the meat was great quality and was sorta blah in taste   One of the slices of meat was undercooked for  medium    The potatoes and the corn were just ok   I wasn t wow ed and probably wouldn t wait that long to eat here again

The reviews on here are all true  This restaurant is authentic  warm  welcoming and so tasty   I was so satisfied with everything we had  The ribeye sandwich was juicy  flavorful and so easy to eat  The corn on the cob was the best I have ever had   The different sauces were amazing  I would eat here every month if I could  Too bad we live out of state

Food was great and worthy of all the   star reviews  We ordered an assortment of meats and sides which really hit the spot  My party also made good timing  arrived on a Friday at   pm  and ordered seated relatively quickly  When we left at  pm  the line was out the door

Delicious food  quick service and reasonable prices  Such an amazing find  I m glad the doctor  not to be mistaken for The Doctor that travels through time and space  though with a new regeneration cycle  it s maybe possible that it was him recommended this place  Do not miss out  seriously  go eat there now  you won t regret it
Gaucho is THE place to go when you have friends in town  It s a bit salty and greasy  but still  who can resist Gaucho

The ribeye was outrageously good  Chicken wings were huge  juicy and generously seasoned  The toasted bread was awesome  The dipping sauces were all amazing   tried all   of them  The saffron rice was very tasty  It did seem odd that the salad didn t come with anything on top  Was I supposed to dress it    Even though it s a self serve place  the employees kept coming by and checking in  Felt very welcome and attended to  So the service was great   The upper room is nicer but the first room is fun too  to see the action at the register   I was only not impressed with the dessert  The creme br l e with a dollop of butterscotch and a few fruits  Not very good at all  but the other stuff was so mind blowing  I can see all why all the fuss    Luckily got there before   because the line was out the door for the rest of the evening  even on a terribly rainy day
Get anything on the menu  it will be great  If you hate the line  call ahead and order for takeout

I don t eat steak  but I ate this steak and I loved it   The sandwich was flavorful and delicious   The kind of sandwich that you eat without putting down once   The only downside was how small the place was   I was able to get their early and have a seat but most people had to have their sandwich to go   The small size says nothing to the flavor of the sandwich was was HUGE and fantastic  highly reccomend

We went here on a Saturday afternoon  We had to wait about    minutes to order  which wasn t too bad  I like the set up of ordering first and being given beverages at the front counter before you re seated  It s pretty efficient  However  given that there aren t actual servers I would expect the place to be a little cleaner  I realize it was super busy  but we had to  clean  off our own table using a napkin  Seating is limited and first come first serve  I can t imagine trying to eat here with a party bigger than     people  Next time  I d order food to go  instead of eating on top of someone else s food remains  I m generally not picky about a few left behind crumbs  but this was particularly messy and there was also garbage on the floor  On a positive note  the carne sandwiches were fantastic and perfectly cooked to our liking  We got the flank sandwich and the New York Strip sandwich  We preferred the flank since the Strip was a little harder to eat on a sandwich and had a lot of fat  We also got an order of papas  which were okay  There wasn t really anything special about them  I really liked the different self serve sauces   I ll definitely be returning for sandwiches to go

One star off because I m jealous there s not one in Los Angeles   Community and fresh  organic food   I must now make more friends in Pittsburg so I can hangout here   Super sad   I just ate Patty s before I got here  so just to accompany my co worker who was running late   So I snacked on a simple beef  delicious  empanada  while he had their recommend sandwich   Needless to say on his first bite the look in his eyes was a  whoa  then the next bites that proceeded was of pure joy   This is the reason main reason to come to town

I m a huge fan of Gaucho and it s super easy to give them   stars   The quality of the food is consistently awesome  Some of my favorites include the flank steak  humita  foccacia  the rosemary braised beef sandwich  seafood stew  grilled corn on the cob  the shrimp    honestly  I ve never had a dish here that I didn t think was delicious  I love that the menu changes seasonally and combines familiar items with more adventurous ones    This place is so fun for a family style meal with a nice bottle or two of wine  BYOB  because you re going to be eating off each other s plates anyway   The steak temperature can be somewhat inconsistent  I started ordering it rare after having a few instances where only the center piece of my steak serving was actually at medium rare  but then ended up with an order of steak that was definitely the Pittsburgh definition of rare  Regardless of this  the steak is always  always delicious and I would probably eat it even if it showed up in a near charcoal state  which it doesn t    As you can see by other reviews  plenty of people are thrown by the ordering seating strategy at Gaucho  There s really nothing wrong with it unless your expectations are a traditional  server runs to my table for every little thing  restaurant  in which case  you should give Gaucho a try when you re feeling a little more independent  At Gaucho  you line up near the door and in front of a huge blackboard menu to order  then seat yourself in the dining area  When your meal is ready  they will bring the food out to you  The line can get very long and there can be some competition for seating during busy times  so I definitely suggest you make your first visit at an off time to really enjoy the experience  Still  we have NEVER failed to get a table and enjoy our meal  The staff are super friendly  helpful  and they really do circulate and make sure you have what you need

Maybe age is making me a bit slow with discovering good food places  I don t know how I only just recently found out about this AMAZING tiny restaurant  After eating there  I actually went on Food Network hoping to find a place to recommend this place to Guy s Diners  Drive Ins  Dives   Unfortunately  I didn t find it    But this place is MOST DEFINITELY Food Network Feature Worthy   Does that say how good this place is yet    Writing this review makes me drool     All of their sandwiches are amazing  if you are a steak lover  you can choose what kind of steak to use for your sandwiches   The chicken and the veggies sandwiches are also really tasty  As a meat lover  I still find the veggie sandwich amazing  The salads they offer are equally as good  When I am in the mood to eat slightly healthy  I go for the salad  The sides are also fun tasty  Just honestly  try all the food on their menu     They are currently under renovation  Can t wait for them to come back with their hopefully bigger space  The line is always out the door on weekends  it s definitely time to upgrade their space
Absolutely the best steak and chicken sandwiches that I ve ever had anywhere  Great grill flavor
The food is excellent and I am so happy about the expanded seating area     I love this place   I ve never had a bad meal
Stopped by at about  pm on a Saturday and only waited for a few minutes   Ribeye steak was delicious as well as the beef empanada  One of the best meals I ve had in Pittsburgh
The wait kinda sucked       hour wait   but totally worth it the food was freakin amazing   Next time  I ll bring a six pack for the wait  Believe the hype
Very different restaurant from   years ago  Did enjoyed it tremendously most recently  Restaurant has changed  Bigger more ample seating  Highly recommended  It is worth the wait
Hands down the best steak sandwich I ve ever eaten and I travel coast to coast and consider myself a foodie  I got the ribeye and it   along with the sauces  were amazing
Food is amazing   The meats are incredible and the sandwiches are outta this world   However I do hate the lines

STELLAR  AWESOME  FANTASTICO   Yeah  that s pretty much how we feel about Gaucho   Just like our experience with Cure  the approach to the restaurant sets the stage for a great meal  since the wonderful smell of open fire grilling will set your tastebuds into a frenzy  All of their items we ordered were nothing short of stupendously delicious and of the highest quality  Here s what we had      Empanadas   honestly  I don t know how you could even consider NOT ordering empanadas if you set foot into an Argentine eatery   shame on you if you didn t order these  They are wonderful  and are definitely the best I ve ever had    even in Argentina      Provoletta   Again  this is an authentic classic  If you don t order this  you should be committed to the insane asylum  Delicious  Comes with a very tasty arugula and lemon vinaigrette side salad  A nice option for a small bite for lunch      Two filet sandwiches   These are huge  On our next visit  we are only going to order one and split it  but this time  we just took the extra one home and wolfed it down the next day   I was instantaneously addicted to this place  and will definitely be back in the near future  Love it  love it  love it

I am definitely in love with this place and enjoyed our dinner there  I would give it five stars if it was more of a sit down restaurant as I struggle with a place where you have to order at the counter and serve yourself things like the silverware and sauce   We ordered a TON of food  empanadas  cheese appetizer  flank steak  ribeye  shrimp  pork  corn  rice  and potatoes  and it was a little over        that is a deal in my book   All the meets were incredible and the corn pudding was out of this world  The sauces are all good as well and between our group we couldn t agree on a favorite  everyone liked a different one and ultimately they were all good and complimented the meats differently   We found a nearby wine shop where we could buy a bottle of wine as it is BYOB   Also  I am sure this sounds crazy but the toasted bread that went along with every dish was SO good  Perfectly grilled and loaded with butter and seasoning   The grilled corn was so good my daughter ordered a second cob after finishing the first   If they could find a way to better serve the meats when you order it family style that would be appreciated

The ecstatic reviews do not over hype this place   it is the best steak sandwich I have ever had    We didn t even know this place existed until we were walking down the street and saw a line out the door  Out of curiosity  we stepped up like sheep to see what treats could attract such a crowd  A line out the door always leaves me worried  but it moved pretty quickly  All in all  we were in line about    minutes before ordering  and it was another    before we got the food  It was absolutely worth the wait    We got   chicken empanadas and two steak sandwiches  one with flank steak and one with NY strip  I love that you can choose your steak  and they have   or   to choose from   The sandwiches come cooked fresh  on soft fresh bread  with delicious caramelized onions and roasted red peppers  The mix of flavors is phenomenal  and the juices from the steak are literally dripping off the sandwiches and getting soaked up by the bread  They also put a chimmi  don t call it chimmichurri  sauce on it that was real tasty and added to the wonderful complexity  There is a decent amount of seating in back  and despite the line  there was plenty of open space  If you re in town  do not skip it

As an Argentinean  I had the bar set pretty high for Gaucho  they did not disappoint  Each cut of meat is flavorful  tender and fresh  The chorizo is so satisfying  The simple salads provide a fresh pause in between bites  And the alfajores satisfy your sweet tooth to close the meal  The one thing I missed  flan and churros     Hoping they expand soon  The line can get pretty long around dinner time

Yum yum yum  I love some good sandwiches   Took a random day trip to Pittsburgh and was searching for a place to meet up with an old friend for lunch  After seeing the hundreds of reviews for this place  we had to check it out   We were able to find parking right down the street from the restaurant  I was a little scared that the line would be one of those agonizing  way too long lines  where your stomach just hurts from being too hungry       but at      pm on a sunny Saturday afternoon  we only stood in line for    minutes  Quite impressive in my opinion  I had read one review that stated that you would wait in line for one hour     but it moved along at a decent pace  in my opinion   Essentially  you order at the cashier  and then you sit down  waiting for your food to be brought out  The whole process actually moves quite fast  Perhaps because people realize there are others waiting in line    I m not sure  but the rate of people eating  then leaving behind seats for others who are coming in  is quite fluid  It was actually very impressive   Anyways  I decided on the carne sandwich  On the chalkboard menu  it stated   choice of vaca   which we then had to google translate  and for those who are interested  it means beef  I chose the arrechera  cooked medium  The others chose the rosemary braised beef   We sat down in a midst of people eating their big sandwiches or big ears of corn  Now this is my kind of place  I thought    Results    My arrechera sandwich  DELICIOUS  First  the meat was very tender and flavorful  It was cooked a perfect medium  almost more to a medium rare  however  I probably should have had it cooked more  so I wouldn t have to chew so hard to break it down  Nonetheless  the flank was good  And the BREAD it came on  Wow  that s good bread  a little bit of garlic in it  but just so fluffy and tasty     a good bread really makes a sandwich    Their rosemary braised beef  apparently  this beef cooks for   hours before they serve it to you   and you can tell  Their instant responses after biting into the sandwiches were   MmmmmMMMMMM      The meat was so moist and tender  that was a good sandwich  On top of it  the bread again  was a stellar winner   Definitely make a stop at this place if you re in the area  It s reallllly tasty

Absolutely fantastic  Charming atmosphere  excellent steak  clever menu that honestly almost made me assume the place was too gimmicky  But I asked a local and they raved about it  Got there around noon on a Saturday which turned out to be  just  in time  The line was out the door about    minutes after we showed up  Three of us split the Asado platter and chorizo sandwich with a small side  and didn t even get through that  Well worth the entirely reasonable price

OMG  the meat is to die for  never have I had meat taste this good  I dream of the meat here  never tasted so good  can t wait to return  don t care if there is a line out the door  I will wait in line to savor the food  I m salivating right now just thinking about it
I don t always eat meat  but when I do  I prefer Gaucho     Stay hungry  my friend
Best food in city to pair with wine  Go early to avoid line  Steak is out if this world

This is easily the best food I have ever had in my entire life   A lingering warmth is left behind for hours after I eat here   Seriously  that does happen   The cost is more than reasonable with this quality and quantity   I have eaten a variety of dishes but my standby is the Rosemary Braised Beef sandwich   Eating any other sandwich anywhere else at this point is blasphemy

It basically doesn t matter what you order  I can guarantee it ll be delicious  As soon as you get within a couple blocks of the place  your mouth will start watering as you smell the smoke and cooking meat

This argentine steakhouse does a fantastic job at guess what  Grilling steaks  The prices are fair  even a little cheap  and  drum roll  it s byob with no corking fee  The empanadas were so so  but my salad and arrachera  flank steak  were great

This is by far my favorite restaurant in Pittsburgh   You have to try the amazing grilled meats here   I ordered the sampler of   different types of steak   The Sirloin was my favorite   They have   different types of homemade  authentic Argentinian sauces   The red sauce and the chimichurri were my favorite   They are BYOB  so bring a bottle of wine and try their food   You will be back

A little tough to find and not a lot of parking around and not much for seating but the food was delicious  Plenty of options on the blackboard and everything seemed to be freshly prepared  I can t remember what I had but it was great and I d be glad to go back and try something new

BYOB   Take note   BYOB  I didn t and expected to buy a bottle of wine   but that in no way took away from the awesome food  From the second you enter the place you are greeted with a olfactory sensory overload of perfectly seasoned seared steak  The eclectic staff is happy to walk you through the menu and help you chose from many fantastically flavored selections from fish to steak  chorizo to empanadas  chicken to grilled veggies  sandwiches to salads   unless of course you already know what you want like we did  Have the Rack of Lamb and any Steak dish and you won t be sorry   and this isn t Aunt Pookies  lamby  Sunday Mutton  this is delicately french boned deliciousness cooked to perfection  I promise  you ll leave satisfied while planning your next visit and with whom you re going to introduce to the Argentinean food fantasy

Great Steaks  pork chops  chicken  basically any protein you can think of that can be grilled  cooked over a open wood grill  you just can t beat this quality of food for     of the price of your high end steak house  The Provoletta is great and a must try as well  if your in the strip  stop at Gaucho and grab a sandwich or steak  you won t be disappointed
This was the best meal in my life  Really  I consider myself a professional fat guy  and this place blew my mind

Always excellent  I remember when it was a small place but the renovation is nice with lots of searing  Great thing is that even when its a   hour wait  the food quality is still A   never had a bad meal here  Be sure to go on an off hour so you dont get caught in the lunch line  Other than that  friendly   awesome food

Definitely lives up to the hype   I ordered the steak sandwich  with a choice of steak meat  I got the filet    For     that s hard to beat  economically speaking  The portion was plenty for me for dinner  The ciabatta bread was very fresh and tasty  and the meat was seasoned and cooked as ordered  medium rare  The onions were nicely caramelized  and the peppers had a great char roasted flavor to them   A friend and I split sides of papas and some kind of corn dish  which complimented our meals well   There are several sauces  self serve  which you can add to your meal  I added some to both my sandwich and papas  I especially liked the red sauce   a tad of spice with a lot of flavor from all of the fresh herbs

It was our first time there yesterday  The food was absolutely amazing  I had the steak burger and my friend had the pork sandwich  Strongly recommend Gaucho  the staff is very helpful and friendly   We will definitely be back soon

This place deserves six stars   The rib eye  flank steak  strip  or any of the vaca plates are my go to  with sides of grilled veggies and papas  Perfectly cooked every time and their homemade sauce selections are excellent    Loved this place before the remodel and even more after   Only bad menu item we ve tried is the corn pudding
So delicious  Long lines move quickly  The staff is so friendly and fun  even play games with you while you wait  Great salsas to choose from and creative flavors

This food here is completely delicious   I ve been on gaucho land in the Argentine highlands and this is better  albeit far more expensive      I had the New York strip   oz and it was perfect caution the line to get in was loooooong and my brother told me it always is   On the bright side I arrived    minutes late while he waited in line      Sooooo I only had to stand in line like    minutes  p  Thanks bro   So what that means is if you have leg issues or something it might not be fir you to stand outside in the sun for that long   But if you do it s worth it  food is great
I haven t been back since the renovation  but have never been disappointed in the food   Hoping there s more seating than previously
Food is great   Service was good  Not a fan of the location   Not a place to take a date if you want to hear her speak   Order ahead and take the food home

I wanted to love Gaucho based on everything I ve read  I didn t  I ll chalk it up to ordering the wrong thing   flank steak sandwich  requested rare and got meat I couldn t chew  I ve grilled flank steak to rare many times  always marinated to break down muscle fibers   so it surprised me to get a piece of meat that was resistant to my teeth  I ll probably try Gaucho again as everything on other diners  plates looked good  but will stay away from the flank or skirt steak options

Amazing  love the food quality and the presentation makes it phenom  Felt like a hipster with the crowd there LOL  but the food was worth the trip  Loved the environment and setup  an all around A  experience

I went  by this place when I was walking down to the Strip District in Pittsburgh  I wasn t sure what it was but there was a line all the way out the door and down the block  I found out It was a lot of local business people waiting to get in for lunch  An hour later I walked back by and the line had shortened somewhat  I decided I had to try it if that many local people were willing to wait  I then looked it up on Yelp and the ratings were fantastic  I had a steak sandwich with chimmichurri and it was fantastic  It is an Argentine type restaurant  The first place I have see fugazetta since Buenos Aires  This place is worth the wait  I looked at all the plates going by and they all looked fantastic  I m sorry I don t have room for the chocolate coconut bread pudding

Best steaks you can get for a semi affordable price  Meats are all very good  I recommend the sampler platter so you can get a taste for each type of meat  Seafood also does not disappoint either  the only reason I would give it   stars is because the food is a little too salty for me

Great food   worth the wait  We arrived at      on a Saturday night and waited in line for an hour     minutes of which was outside  We made friends with other people in line and started the party  We opened our wine  which made the time go faster  Bring cups and an opener  For our meal  the four of us shared everything  Universally  I d say that the smoky  charred flavor from the oven carried through deliciously across all dishes   Asado Platter   Fabulous  I would take a piece of the steak on the toast with some sauce   the red pepper was my favorite   Sprauhts   Perfection  Campfire Yams   Unexpected favorite  This was unbelievably sweat and delicious   Argentino Ensalada   Great balance to all of the meat we enjoyed   Empanadas  chicken and beef    The only disappointment  There was a lot of dough and wasn t all that flavorful  The next time we come  I would arrive earlier to avoid the line  Also  I would not get the Empanadas and instead try the chorizo or shrimp
Very tasty food and friendly service  You might be in for a wait for a table   but that s because it s delicious and well priced  Great casual ambiance  Excellent lunch spot

V good  You line up  order your food and you get seated  For us  the line started just outside the door but it still took us    minutes to get through the whole process  My friend and I shared the pulled pork    empanadas  the papas side  and the grilled shrimp  Everything was so delicious  The pulled pork was so juicy and flavorful  the papas were very soft and garlic y  and the shrimp had that wonderful charcoal slightly burnt taste  For the empanadas we got the chicken and the beef  Beef was alright  but the chicken was good  The dough was a bit dry though  We also shared the nutella crumble  I forget the exact name  but it was nutella bread pudding with a cookie crumble and hazelnuts  Kind of too sweet but really good  The staff is very nice and helpful during the ordering process and it s a good medium noise level so you can have fun with friends

Visited at  pm just as the lunch rush was leaving  Probably    people in line  Immediately greeted by a gentleman in line taking   of people in each party  The long line actually gives you time to browse the amazing menu wish so many choices  It s BYOB with no corkage fee but this was lunch  The guy filling drinks was helping people on what to order and showing pictures of meals on his  phone  As I was checking out the girl at the register was giving me tips about the place   You get your own silverware and sauces off the wall that was a first   Waiters and Servers stopped by several times to check on my drink even while this place is packed  Food was immaculate  People continued to check on my meal and refill my drink   Highly recommend to anyone

Do NOT go at typical dining hours  I went around   and waited almost   hours and thought the food was overrated  There s nowhere to wait so you have to stand outside and wait in a line that wraps around the building  Didn t care for the atmosphere either and overall not sure why people like it as much as they do
This is a carnivores paradise  meat  meat and a side meat  Had a steak sandwich  which was surprising an overwhelming portion size for even a cave man like myself

Wonderful sandwich shop in with he Strip District  long lines but worth the wait  They also have wonderful salads and other foods   It is a very casual place with very friendly service and high quality flavorful food  Read the chalk board menu and be ready to order when you get to the register  They have nice seating inside and a funky patio outside but seats are limited   We started with pork empanadas that required no sauces  The crust was perfect combination of crispy outside and flaky just underneath  The salads were fresh  large and tasty   The star is the meat  We had sandwiches  The Carne is a pick your meat  filet  rib eye     and how cooked  rare  medium rare     on a nice bun with peppers and caramelized onions  They have a selection of tasty sauces to use as well   Thoroughly enjoyed it

Im on the bandwagon      im in the military and stopped here on my way to the airport  I was in uniform and the cashier literally pulled out his credit card and paid for my meal  Extremely unecessary  but i am unbelievably greatful  I got a strip steak sandwich to go so I didnt get to experience sitting down  but next time that will be happening  The crew members joked around with me and all seemed extremely pleasant  From a service standpoint definently a    out of    Lets get to the sandwich     the bread  So fresh so delicious just absolutely incredible  The steak  Cooked perfectly and again  delicious  The peppers and onions  They had some sort of sweet glaze or sauce with it  which blended perfectly  Oh my goodness  To say it was amazing is such a huge understatement  Im a big eater and the sandwich was enough to make me feel content  trust me     it took all my effort to not gorge myself to death of extra food        Anyways  please excuse me as i go take a food coma nap

It took me a long time to get to Gaucho  longer than I would have liked but the wait was well worth it and now with their expanded seating it makes it a bit easier to get a spot  unless It s a weekend then it s every person for themselves  but regardless once you get a spot the food is incredible  The flank steak is my favorite for sure but I really don t think you can go wrong on your choice  The staff also seem to truly enjoy what they are doing and are extremely kind  Now I just need to figure out when I m going back next

Best lunch spot in Pittsburgh   For those of us who don t eat a ton of of meat  especially red meat  this can seem like an unlikely choice   but I promise you you will not be disappointed  And don t be intimidated by the line which is always wrapping out the door and up the   th St  bridge  It is worth the wait if for nothing other than the steak burger    I ve also had the gaucho salad topped with the shredded chicken and it is outstanding  And let s  talk about those sauces    Just get as many little cups and fill them up with every single one  I never remember what s what  but truthfully it doesn t matter      This is one of those places where the food really does live up to the expectations set by all of the press reviews  It s just that good

Really everything I ve tried here so far has been amazing   Definitely try the grilled chicken along with ajo   Another recommendation is the mixed grilled platter  It gives you a chance to sample the chicken  steak and the chorizo  The next time you visit you can  home  in on your meat of choice

Believe the hype   Not much to add from other reviewers   Plan to wait in line   It moves fast but there  is always a line   Bring a bottle of wine  no corkage fee   Get the mushrooms side dish   I d try to recommend other items but everything I ve had is equally delicious   It s also extremely reasonable pricing   Go and enjoy

The food is amazing  You will probably have to wait in a long line though and maybe not get a table because it is extremely popular  In regards to the private room  we held our rehearsal dinner for probably    people in May      and I can t say enough how wonderful it was  Almost everyone said it was the best food they ve ever had including people who live in LA as well as my mid western family who aren t keen on trying different types of food  The service was above and beyond what you could ever expect  The staff was professional but fun  They took pictures of the group and joked around with them all night while also being quick and professional  I really can t praise them enough

When our production crew and I were in town for work  we were told in reverential tones about this place   and wow  Glad we decided to brave the line  I ve not found a great deal of Argentinian steak places in the US that aren t out west  but this one was a gem    First thing to know  it s not really a sit down  inside  place  They have a couple of counters with a few seats  and then a nice little patio around the building s corner  but otherwise it looks like a carry out place  We weren t aware of this  but found patio spots regardless   As you d expect from a place specializing in Argentinian beef  the thing to order is steak  Or as it s written on the chalkboard  CARNE     I had the ribeye sandwich with onions and tomatoes along with   different types of very subtly different chimichurri sauces  In a word  outstanding  Most of the guys had various types and cuts of beef and all were just perfectly seasoned and the flavor hits you immediately  Can t decide what kind of chimichurri to try  No worries  there is a large table in front of the register that has several large jars of all the different made from scratch options they offer  Take as many as you like to try  They also have a good selection of side dishes to share  try the grilled potatoes   One last element can t go unmentioned  If you re thinking this place looks good but you have a vegetarian with you  no problem  We tried to order the meat based empanadas  Can t remember what kind of meat  but for some reason they were out of the cut they usually do them with  So   with very skeptical attitudes  we opted for the vegetarian empanadas   and they were AMAZING  Just the right mixture of ingredients  perfect texture  served piping hot  They FAR exceeded all expectations for a pack of carnivores like us  Pittsburgh  you ve got a real winner here

I went to Gaucho s with a friend at around     pm so we didn t have to wait long to get seated  We ordered a large NY strip steak to share  as well as a side dish of mushrooms  The mushrooms were really good and aromatic  However  the steak that we had requested to be cooked medium came out to be too well done  When we told our waitress about it  she agreed with us that it was too well done and went to get her manager  The manager then came  apologized and offered to remake our steak  They were both extremely polite and friendly and handled the situation very well  The steak we ended up getting was perfectly juicy and tender

This place is amazing  I really was contemplating walking out of the    minute line  but boy am I glad I sucked it up and waited  I ve since come back  x  So yes  you ll probably have to wait in line  and as a heads up you need to order all your food at once and pay for it right there  So plan in our    min wait on everything that you want to eat    One of the great things about Gaucho is that they are a BYOB  I ve failed at remembering this both times  but hopefully someone reading this will benefit from this  Bring your wine or beer  they do not serve alcohol   Hmm recommendations on what to get   beef empanadas  shrimp  steak   and as I m writing this I m realizing I don t think you can go wrong with anything you order   But the shrimp is some of the best I ve had  and we got the party group order of steak  Can t remember what it is called but comes with all the cuts of meats they serve   it was phenomenal and great for sharing with a group    They have the best salsas and sauces so don t forget to get some of these  chimichurri  garlic  and   others that I can t remember off the top of my head  All were very tasty and went well with the meats   You can also order take out  but beware when you walk in to pick up your food and people are standing in line waiting they will give you the evil eye as you walk out with their food while their bellies are rumbling  of course I didn t do that

Stopped in to Gaucho while walking around the strip  You cannot resist the wood fired smell as you pass by  The service is friendly at this small amazing Argentinian cafe  Wood  fired grilled steaks  chorizo and seafood  sandwiches   small bites and entrees  Help yourself to   unique sauces and a lot of great food  Don t miss Gaucho

I ve had basically everything on the menu here  I suggest getting a sandwich  it is truly one of the greatest I have ever had  The veggies are a must too  This place just blows it out of the water every time  Affordable and amazing  One of the best places to eat in the city  hands down

So what good is another   star review  But I must review it  I m obsessed with this place  I tried it for the first time a few weeks ago  and I took crazy pictures and sent it to all my friends  I told them they had to visit just for the sandwich alone   The steak sandwich is truly their best thing  It s grilled and seasoned perfectly  Although they have a sauce station  it really isn t necessary  The broiche bun is also chewy  and it doesn t get soggy  The papas  potatoes  are done well  and the grilled corn  a must as well   I loved  loved it  I ve had similar offerings in other major cities  and this is one of best sandwiches I ve tried  Who knew that Pittsburgh had the best Argentinian steak sandwich   Oh yeah  BYOB with no corking fee  Score

This is a cute little restaurant in the strip district   I was greeted by the ambassador with the name Don  He was very nice and explained to me all the dishes including his recommendations  I had the new York strip and it was cooked to my request   The restaurant was small so the max capacity was around    ppl the most   Overall the food was good and the kitchen staffs were very friendly   This place is very small so don t be shock if you have to stand by the sauce and condiments table in the middle of the restaurant   This is so great about these little neighborhood restaurants b c you feel like you re at home   I m not sure about others  but I m not here for the   stars ambience   It s all about the food taste for me   I ate at places where I have to sit on the curb  and the police chased after the food vendor for non established restaurant   If I have to sit on the sidewalk for Gaucho then SIDEWALK IT IS

Absolutely great place for lunch or weekend shopping  It s a little cramped inside  but worth it  Everything on the menu that I ve had has been delicious so you really can t go wrong  Definitely try all the sauces they have set out  Worth the price

I recommend ordering the salad  either regular size or share the large size  plus ask add on the steak or braised beef  You can also buy  toast  it s like a large crispy crostini  Good quality meat  Casual  cool place to eat  Metered street parking was easy to find during the weekday

Super friendly and upbeat staff that make you smile from start to finish and absolutely delicious food make this place worth the wait  the line was out the door    The trendy and young crowd made me worry that we might have picked the wrong place to take our    year old at first   However  we ordered the Bife de Gaucho  Pollo Parrillada  Pork and Chicken Empanadas  Arroz  Maiz  and Vegetales   My child  who is a super picky eater  ate some of everything and agreed that it was all delicious   I wish they had this place in Chicago
Great food and service  I d avoid peak hours  The wait can be long but it s totally worth it
I came here because a coworker told me to check it out and he was right  This place is the best lunch spot  The steak sammiches are amazing  Highly recommend

I heard great things about this place and that it was a  must  when visiting Pittsburgh  After waiting nearly an hour in line  we finally ordered from their giant menu of items   Its an order first  then sit down and we bring the food to you place   The only thing I can appreciate  but would rather have them do differently is the presentation of the menu  It s on a giant blackboard when you walk in and they use odd words for simple ingredients  so you re standing there just trying to figure out what s in the food  for example  shrooms   mushrooms  grass   asparagus     Aside from the menu  the service was nice up front  great manager  he will always find a seat for you and your party   however the servers that wait the tables are very unprofessional  All the staff where whatever they want and it s not very helpful when you need to flag someone down  There was a woman with half her stomach hanging out in very short shorts   not pleasant    On to the food   the salad I ordered was amazing   very tasty  The empanadas were bland and too pricey     ea   I still agree that if you re in the area  you must come try the food

I finally made it here a few weeks ago for lunch  I ve had their amazing food truck offerings before but had not been to their restaurant   Lunch on a weekday is busy but the woman taking our drink order treated us like we were her only customer  She gave some great suggestions for ordering  It was a toss up for me between steak and salad  She recommended the salad with steak  What a novel idea    Why didn t I think of that   So  I got the Argentio with medium rare steak  It was so good   The steak was cooked just right and there where so many good flavors mixed together in the Argentio salad  I would go back again just for that  But they have some many other amazing sounding items on their menu  I can t wait to go back

Food is good  maybe somewhat overpriced but quality meats and delicious tasting food  I wish they had a bigger space  parking and a liquor license to serve  but some people may prefer the BYOB aspect of it

One of my favorite restaurants in Pittsburgh   Just wonderful   everyone I take there thanks me with amusement   Food is delicious  fresh  well prepared  staff is nice and cordial   I just wish they took reservations because the line is quite long at times  but don t be discouraged   It is worth the wait

You can t go wrong with any meal here  Definitely one of the best restaurants In the city  Be warned   it s casual and you order in line when you walk in so not a fancy ambiance at all  but a must try for any  meat lover  The carne sandwiches are my go to and the spicy chorizo is untouchable  Beef empanadas are really good as well

I really would have liked to give these guys   or   starts but in spite of great appetizers  reasonable prices  and friendly service  the flank steak entree I had was pretty lacking  It just tasted charred  I intend to go back and try a different dish because I have a really good feeling about this place and I think they may have just messed up my order  But I was not impressed with the first steak I had

Food poisoning  I get it  this place is very popular  Lines out the door  People raving about it  Staff emboldened  Lots of buzz  But  when things don t go quite as planned that is the true test of an establishment  I ve been coming here weekly for some time  Two weeks ago I decided to try the  steak burger  cooked medium  which I have never eaten there before  I got it to go  got home  was very hungry  but midway through eating it  though it was flavorful  I felt a rumbling in the stomach and physically could not finish it     minutes later I was in the bathroom with a problem  My GI tract was thrown off for a week  I called Gaucho and asked to speak to management  Spoke to manager Mike  told him the problem  told him to please check the burger batch and not feed that to any more customers as it was clearly contaminated  He assured me he would speak to chef and offered to get me a free meal to make up for it  I didn t expect that  but then he took my number and said he would call within the next few days to follow up  No call came  It s been   weeks  Don t make empty promises  especially when your customer was sickened by your food  This has left me very bitter to Gaucho  Enjoy the yummy tasting food but don t expect this place to do anything for you if you have a problem  And watch out for the burger

Luckily walked to Primanti Bros  after a Pirates game and on the way there  my nose picked up the magical aroma of wood smoke  Popped my head in and found they opened at    for the next days lunch   You can smell the smoke from outside and once you walk in it s amplified  The inside is small with my a dozen seats  The menu is written on a chalkboard on the wall  full of tough choices  We decided on the rosemary braised beef sandwich   corn and sweet potatoes  The sandwich was enormous and amazing  The corn and sweet potatoes were cooked over an open fire and also delicious    I will definitely return next visit

It s not Argentina but this place is close enough  It s a fast casual place so you order when you walk in and they call you by name when your order is up  Unfortunately they don t have a liquor license  which we didn t know until we got there  but it s BYOB with no corkage fee  All the utensils plates are also self serve and located right after the order counter  Reynaldo have   sauces available  classic chimichurri  garlic  smokey pepper and onion   We ordered the carne and rosemary beef sandwiches  beef empanada  red potatoes and of course the alfajores  The beef empanada was ok and could go without it   Everything else were amazing though  Both sandwiches were great but I especially loved the carne  You get a choice of the cut of beef and how you want it cooked  just like any great steak place    The sandwich had a great amount of nicely charred and perfectly cooked meat in it  The flavor is already great but I love garlic so I had to add some of their garlic sauce  Another amazing garlic surprise are the grilled garlic gloves that came with the potatoes  You can t go wrong with finishing up your amazing meal with some alfajores  They are very delicate though so they don t travel well   Definitely a great place for meat  carb and garlic lovers

It s all been said already but I ll say it again just to add to the   star reviews  Yummy     We had the Rosemary braised beef sandwich and the chorizo sandwich  Bread was so stellar and crispy and chorizo so nice and spicy  I added some red sauce to the braised beef sandwich and it took it up even another notch  The corn was good and juicy and the grilled vegetables with balsamic were flavor packed as well    Next time I m in town I will try the steak platters  they looked amazing    Also the back patio had many seats even during a very busy time of day and the staff came out to check on how we were doing and asked how the food is  Nice people working there  This place is not to be missed

Gaucho Parilla  Considering this is a hotspot  this place is great  However  the meat is a bit on the rarer side on the inside and charred on the outside  However  the sauces they have  chimichurri  ajo  etc   are amazing  You must flavor your meat like this  It is a very hip experience  and is an awesome place to eat lunch  However  make sure to be prepared for a line and or come early  The menu is also kind of narrow  In conclusion  I give this restaurant four stars because it is a great atmosphere  but the meat isn t as amazing as authentic Argentinian meat  which I have tried before  This might be because it is the US and it would be too hard to import  duh   But  yeah  I definitely recommend this place

They re not exactly a well oiled machine in getting food out  clearing tables  or seating people  and the one main seating room is just   flat walls that reverberate sound really loudly it s difficult to have a conversation  However  the food was great  The caramelized veggie plate  papas and the mixed meat plate all had really great flavors and portions were perfect for two very hungry out of towners  Would recommend if you have the time to wait
If you like meat  this is the place  Everything we had was delicious and full of flavor  Best to call in an order than wait in the line  Oh  and BYOB  Enjoy

They were closing today so we had to get a taste before we went back home  Every time we tried to get in the line was huge  Now I know why  It s such an amazing experience  Delicious flank steak sandwich  Grilled vegetables and grilled corn  Will be back  They are closing for   weeks

Absolutely delicious  We ate here for a rehearsal dinner and it was easily one of the best meals I have ever had in the city   Service was fantastic  and the meat and potatoes were amazing    Will definitely come back again

Delicious   Everything we ordered was great  Sirloin steak plate  potatoes  rice   and Caramelized onions  Yum    The menu was a little confusing and overwhelming  but the staff was very helpful and friendly

Believe the hype   I ordered the carne sandwich with filet mignon steak and was astounded  The steak was cooked to a juicy medium rare  The peppers were charcoaled perfectly  The caramelized onions were sweet and savory  The chimichurri added a nice bitter taste  And the bread absorbed all the juices and allowed all of the different flavors to stand out in unison   This was one of the best sandwiches I ve ever had  It s undoubtedly the best sandwich I ve had in Pittsburgh  I m not even sure we should refer to it as a sandwich considering how transcendental it is

Guacho has one of the best steak sandwiches in Pittsburgh  They serve authentic Argentinian cuisine in a hip  casual setting  This particular time I ordered the Argentino salad with ribeye  and a side of provoletta  All of our food came out in a timely matter and everything was delicious  especially the ribeye  Their friendly staff  cool setting   delicious menu make this restaurant one of the best in the Strip  I can t wait to come back and try more of their incredible food options  although it will be hard to switch up my order when the steak is so good

Great lunch  First time to PITT and was told to check this place out by a buddy  Wasn t disappointed at all  Not overly busy at lunch and took my time to read the menu  Everything I ordered was delicious and would recommend  Super clean and very friendly staff  You do order first and then sit so keep that in mind  They bring your food out and they have pseudo waiters that clean up your plates which is nice  Tipping apparently is at the beginning as well  Little different but whatever    everyone seems to be putting a little different spin on how things work these days  I got up and refilled my water as I needed and if your boozing it s BYOB  otherwise they have some pop and some other non etoh options
Amazing  It taste like I m on vacation  My   year old son absolutely loved the ribeye plate and the saffron rice was perfect  He empanada crust was favorful   I will certainly return
Happened to be in the strip and noticed there was NO line which is very unusual  Had skirt steak sandwich and officially fell in love with Gaucho Parrilla  AMAZING

We were only in Pittsburgh off one night and wanted to find something different to try   Based on the excellent rating and reviews  we tried this out  We were NOT disappointed  The food we excellent  The staff was very friendly and made a point to converse with us throughout the meal  but definitely not in an annoying way   Also the atmosphere was casual and fun and very communal in nature  This would be a great place to take a group and share several entrees with the table

One of my favorite restaurants in Pittsburgh  Always worth the wait  Ask for the bread not to be too toasted and the carne is always good  If they have muscles  order them  the best I have ever had in the US  The potatoes always good as sides

It was good as always  We had rosemary braised beef  steak burgh and maiz  love all   kind of sauce  the rosemary beef has been a all time favorite so far and we tried the steak sampler as well as some other sandwiches and burgh that i forgot about the name of  but everything we have tried here were great so i don t think anybody can ever go wrong with any pick

I can see why this place has so many reviews  The steak was just meaty perfection especially dipped in the abundant garlic and chimichurri sauces  The empanada was okay  We tried the chicken chorizo  I loved the cauliflower side dish too  We got the hanger steak and the sirloin steak and it came with salad and charred bread and the heavenly sauces

Food is amazing but since it s always crowded  they rush you out  They were so rude to my friends and I one day when we were catching up after dinner  They asked us to leave since there were people coming in  I understand you re busy but they were very rude about it

BYOB  Had a NY strip plate  Very flavorfully marinated meat  nicely charred  very tender likely topped with herb sauce  There are upstairs tables and few tables downstairs and counter seating  The line builds up fast during rush hours  expect a wait
Lines out the door  but the food is amazing  If they are busy  They will kick you out as soon as your done eating to get your table  so be prepared for that  BYOB  No corkage fees  Would  return

Visited on a weekday when it was less crowded  ordered    empanadas for      for our family of     Food came out immediately  probably due to what we ordered   Others with more complex meals waited longer than us for their food   Many yummy sauces available to dip  adding to the adventure for our family   Drove by on a Saturday     pm and a line was out the door   be ware   Filled to the brim with hipsters eating hip food   Not a problem  but we are square    something suburbanites   Joke   How do you get rid of a hipster   Throw him in the main stream

The food was amazing   I m here for a conference and stumbled upon this gem of a restaurant  It s a must try  You do have to wait in line and then they seat you  There was a young lady that came out and went through the line to answer questions   It made the time fast and honestly I didn t mind after the amazing food was presented   I had the beet salad with shrimp  empanada and roasted cauliflower  It was all amazing  The food is prepped per order   My co worker had a steak that he said was awesome   It s a must try  Be patent it s worth the wait
The food is too oily for my taste and i am not partial to the flavors  Atmosphere is nice  Just not for me

Time to add the umpteenth   star review for the Gaucho   The place was bumping even at an off time  mid afternoon on a Saturday  but fortunately we grabbed one of the few seats in the rustic eating area   Enjoyed a three meat combo plate with delicious steak  grilled chicken and sausage   The best part was the grilled bread   toasty and salty with olive oil drizzled on top   Definitely seek this place out in the Strip District   es muy bueno

I tried Gaucho about a week ago and it was a very interesting and satisfying experience  I went on a Thursday evening and was able to enjoy a table with   other friends comfortably in a relaxed and inviting atmosphere  This being my first experience it is one that I recommend to anyone looking for something different in the city  I had the red snapper filet and it was delicious  The four sauce choices made a big difference and he roasted potatoes complimented the snapper seamlessly  Check out Gaucho Parrilla Argentina

I have been to Gaucho s a few times now and it has been a consistently great experience each time  Great place to take people visiting out of town  right in the Strip District  very close to downtown  They don t take reservations and demand is high  so there are often lines and wait of upwards of    minutes on the weekends especially   So  is the wait worth it  I d say yes  although definitely recommend going on a weekday if you can  Their steak is flavorful and reasonably priced and served with bread and a salad  They have a variety of dipping sauces of which I always take back all four to the table even though I definitely have a favorite  I just always forget which one it is     Their empanadas are amazing  especially the beef ones although the chicken ones are pretty good  too  not a fan of the vegetarian cheese ones I once tried    the options rotate frequently  so there s always a new filling to try    I ve heard the dessert there is good as well  but have not had the chance to try yet

Very nice and cozy  place  with delicious food   we got Lamb chops  and whole wing it s was amazing   you can bring your own Bottle lot of interesting people dining here  very crowded so come in advance

Gaucho s doesn t need my review   but I will give it anyway    LOVE LOVE LOVE IT   WOW   this place is really amazing   The beef is crazy delicious  and the roasted veggies were seriously the best ever   I know there is always a long wait and limited seating   BUT   if you can visit during an off time  like mid afternoon    you can get right in and get a table   We are lucky to have a fantastic creative restaurant like this in Pittsburgh

Gaucho has left me inspired  So inspired that I feel the need to write poetry   A Haiku to Honor Gaucho  Meat meat meat meat meat  Meat meat meat meat meat meat meat  Meat meat meat meat  Yum     AND   An Ode to Rosemary Braised Beef  Your beef is so juicy   Your onion so sweet  Your bread is so lovely  You re the best thing to eat   Your horseradish is horsey   Every flavor in place  Now stop waxing poetic And get in my face     Everything about Gaucho is perfection  the staff  the atmosphere  the sauces  and the food  There s always a line  of course  but it moves fairly quickly  This place is a well oiled machine  You order and pay at the register  grab your drinks  and give your name  Then you pray to the restaurant gods for an open table  Front of the house staff will help you with this endeavor     Food is served up quickly and it s some of the best food that I ve tasted in the Burgh  Meat is flavorful and cooked perfectly  The potatoes are little nuggets of happiness  Each of the four house sauces are exciting and distinctly delicious  I m in love
